bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２連ダメージ
bb.name: ディバインソード

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined La Veda Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Raised as an orphan in a monastery, he originally wanted to become a monk. However one day, bandits attacked the monastery. After Atro repelled them with just a tree branch, the Friar recommended he seek a Vedan fencing expert. Atro followed the Friar's words and began his journey.
dictionary.fusion:
Fencing is now my life.
I need to concentrate on it.
dictionary.summon:
I am the swordsman, Atro.
Not sure how much I can help,
but I'll do my best.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: カテドラルジャッジメント

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined La Veda Republic, later he became one of the Six Heroes. As advised by the Friar that raised him, Atro trained with a fencing master, quickly becoming a gifted swordsman. His technique was keen, and he had integrity thanks to his monastery childhood. He earned the title of "Sword Saint." Unaware of this, he continued to train daily.
dictionary.evolution:
I will dedicate my
Vedan fencing skills to
serving you.
dictionary.fusion:
I am full of vigor.
How do you propose I make
use of this energy?
dictionary.summon:
If you can show me the future,
with my Vedan fencing skills,
I will become your sword.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: ザウザンドネメシス

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined La Veda Republic, he later became one of the Six Heroes. He received the never before drawn legendary Light Sword Urias from its holy resting place, becoming a master swordsman in name and deed. Urias, tempered by the gods, was extremely powerful. It's said that Atro never drew it in fights with swordsmen who sought fame.
dictionary.evolution:
Urias was made to vanquish
evil, not to harm people!
Let us advance together!
dictionary.fusion:
I've got to become stronger
if I'm to be known as a
master swordsman...
dictionary.summon:
My reputation along with
Urias's strength.
I dedicate them to you.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: メシアハザード

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined La Veda Republic. One of the Six Heroes, he faced the great battle with the gods wielding the Light Sword Urias. He struggled with whether or not to fight the gods, but finally decided to when they destroyed the monastery he grew up in. He cut down the gods in a rage, breaking with his former reputation as a graceful master swordsman.
dictionary.evolution:
Light Sword Urias!
Give your master the strength
to suppress evil!
dictionary.fusion:
I still lack power!
Grant me the power to
defeat the gods!
dictionary.summon:
My sword is yours, always!
Now, it's time to release
Urias' true power!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ヘブンズゲイト

dictionary.description: A swordsman from the ruined La Veda Republic who later became one of the Six Heroes. As Atro fought back violently after the monastery where he grew up was destroyed, in the midst of battle the legendary sword Urias was broken. Coming to his senses, Atro realized how immature he still was, and he then swore on his sword that he would wield it only to protect his people. With his words, Urias gave off a brilliant light, and it's told its resurrected form was more sublime than ever.
dictionary.evolution:
No more distractions!
From now on, I wield this sword
only to protect my people!
dictionary.fusion:
Watch Urias shine even brighter!
For what purpose do you plan on
using this new power?
dictionary.summon:
My Urias is pleased!
We get to fight alongside you!
Let's build a brighter future!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光輝神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ヴェリタス・デルタ

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ
bb.name: イノセントグレイヴ

dictionary.description: Finally coming to his senses after having lost his precious blade, Atro witnessed a knight appear before him. As the knight spoke to him, Atro began to swing his sword at the knight with an expression of agony on his face. However, once Kuda took the children as hostages, Atro stopped retaliating and faced the knight's strike in silence. As soon as Kuda released the children, the dying hero pierced Kuda with his holy sword, taking the assassin's life. It is said that Atro's last words to the knight were "May it bring a bright future for the children."
dictionary.evolution:
If it's for the children's future,
I've no need for this life!
I'll surpass even the gods!
dictionary.fusion:
Urias already has the power
to surpass the gods.
I'm the only one left to grow now!
dictionary.summon:
Humans still live,
and the children smile.
I want to believe I did what's right.

extra skill.desc: 「聖光剣ユリアス」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量をかなり軽減
extra skill.name: 剣聖の祈り

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光天神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: インフィニットアウローラ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力を大幅にアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: ティル・ナ・ノーグ

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２連ダメージ
bb.name: 痛いのいっくよ〜！

dictionary.description: A woman with glittering hair who suddenly appeared in the La Veda Republic when the battle with the gods began. She fought the gods with a giant lance and her heroism and mysterious origins led some to worship her as a messiah. This ended when she spoke. Luna was very foul-mouthed. What she said was so terrible that it was never recorded in the history books.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey, I'm over here!
Now, make me stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Don't call on me so ubruptly!
Huh? You need my lance?
Then gimme something to stab!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: ホントに痛いのいくよ！

dictionary.description:
A woman with glittering hair who suddenly appeared in the La Veda Republic as the battle with the gods began. Her attacks and verbal abuse grew as she fought. The verbal abuse confused not only the enemy, but also her own army. She would suddenly appear, go berserk, and then disappear.
She was sometimes said to be an avatar of a god, but upon hearing this she responded with little more than a wry smile.
dictionary.evolution:
Check me out, I evolved!
Quick, get me to the battlefield
so I can try this out!
dictionary.fusion:
This still isn't enough!
I wanna stab someone!
dictionary.summon:
Huh? You wanna be friends?
Alright then, I was bored anyway.
Now, wanna pick a figh!?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: 私の本気見せてあげる！

dictionary.description: A woman with glittering hair who suddenly appeared in the La Veda Republic as the battle with the gods began. In the latter stages of the war, she appeared and turned the tide of battle when La Veda was facing unfavorable odds. Her sparkling armor earned her the title of Holy Champion, but she later ruined that with what she said. Luckily, her words went unrecorded.
dictionary.evolution:
Whaddya think? I'm pretty awesome, right?
To the battlefield!
dictionary.fusion:
You're so sweet!
You know just what I want!
dictionary.summon:
Stop your complaining and
get a move on already, will ya?
I already promised I'd help!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: とっておき見せてあげる！

dictionary.description: A woman with glittering hair who suddenly appeared in the La Veda Republic when the battle with the gods began. Though she both spoke and attacked without mercy, her actions during the La Veda Republic's retreat after the great war were uncharacteristic of her. As other soldiers struggled along, Luna adorned her armor with gaudy decorations and bashed away at the gods who were after them. It's said that seeing this brought back a smile to the soldiers' faces, and gave them the courage to once again pick up their weapons.
dictionary.evolution:
I hate sad faces!
If you're gonna do something,
do it flamboyantly!
dictionary.fusion:
More, gimme more!
You have all the power needed
to satisfy me, don't you?
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me!
You know what this means, right?
Now you have to keep me company!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 後悔しても遅いんだから！

dictionary.description: A soldier who fought at the frontlines of La Veda until the very end during the great war with the gods. As the intense battle continued, Luna targeted a seemingly displeased disciple who appeared on the battlefield, as if she had been expecting this to happen. Those around her tried to cooperate by attacking as a group, but were stopped by Luna, who went after the disciple by herself. According to the accounts the witnesses left behind, she looked stronger and more divine than ever.
dictionary.evolution:
The time to play my part has come.
Who am I, you ask?
Figure it out for yourself!
dictionary.fusion:
What do you think is the purpose
of me growing stronger?
Think about it really well!
dictionary.summon:
That's the second time we fight.
Once in Bariura,
and one more time in La Veda.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの波動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: ファスファラス

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 噛みつきフォトン

dictionary.description: A type of slime with a sparkling body. They are a very common creature, although their origin is unknown. Some think they were made at the time of creation, and have since increased in number. Most are basically kind. When they find a person walking at night, they offer themselves as lamps. However, since there are so many, some have become violent and will attack humans.
dictionary.fusion:
What's this? I've gotten brighter.
Mind if I shine my light on you?
dictionary.summon:
I'll light up your way,
so please, take me with you...

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 丸かじりフォトン

dictionary.description: There are many mysteries about Glowy Slime, including its origin, but the most curious thing is the existence of Glowy Slime King. It's said that a group of slimes merge to become a Glowy Slime King. However, as no other slime demons have done this before, researchers are puzzled how this could happen. When Glowy Slime King appears, even the night becomes as bright as day.
dictionary.evolution:
Haha, how dazzling!
I'm so much brighter now!
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe, am I too bright?
Really? I'm too bright?
dictionary.summon:
I'm sorry, I can't help
it that I'm so bright.
I can go if it's too much...

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 食べ尽くしフォトン

dictionary.description: The Kaiser Glowy is the evolved form of a King Glowy which became stronger in order to adapt to Ishgria's environment. Directly affected by Ishgria's habitat, the Kaiser Glowy is much more weary than a King Glowy, and thus some of them are known to be quite aggressive. On the other hand, there are various accounts stating that some Kaiser Glowy will guide injured Summoners to places of refuge. In some other instances, this creature will also act as the leader of other Glowies, working together as a team to take down other beasts.
dictionary.evolution:
Please take in the glory
of my new radiance!
Feast your eyes on my light!
dictionary.fusion:
He he he... I'm even brighter now!
Please bear with my brilliance.
Ugh, my eyes... *Sparkle*
dictionary.summon:
Can you see me glow?
Because sometimes I'm so bright,
people can't see me at all!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 光神の天冠

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: ミルキー・ウェイ

dictionary.description: A white mage that was active in the ruined La Veda Republic during the ancient war. She was magically gifted as a child, and traveled around the world healing people with her white mage parents. The light released from her wand could heal multiple wounds simultaneously. She was known for liking sweets, and rumor has it that she kept lots of snacks up her sleeves.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm so much shinier!
Would you like to see?
dictionary.summon:
I am Mimir, Master of Light.
I will help light the
way to God

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: セイントべネディクション

dictionary.description: A white mage who was active in the ruined La Veda Republic during the ancient war. She traveled around healing people since she was a child. At age 25, people began praising her as a sage. Her healing ability matured year after year to the point she became able to heal even the severely wounded in an instant. Her sweet tooth grew as well. She was a legendary snacker, eating up to 10 times a day.
dictionary.evolution:
Please stay with me.
I promise to dedicate my
healing light to you.
dictionary.fusion:
The sparkling even more!
Now, let us go forth and
bring peace to the masses!
dictionary.summon:
What is it that drives
you toward your future?
Shall we seek it out together?

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: スターヒール

dictionary.description: A white mage that was active in the ruined La Veda Republic during the ancient war. By the time the war with the gods had started, her healing powers had grown miraculously strong. She freely wielded her powers saving countless people who in turn called her a saint, to which she simply smiled. She would never accept payment for her services, but it's said she would take sweet treats, albeit after a bit of hesitation.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you see how the light
has grown strong inside me?
It shines along with you!
dictionary.fusion:
My healing light grows!
With this power I can save
even more people!
dictionary.summon:
I see healing powers are needed.
Of course I'll lend mine to you.
Alright, let's save the people!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 光の剣

dictionary.description: A humanoid with pure-white wings on its back. They are so submissive to the gods that they have nearly no individuality. They spend most of their time worshiping the gods, but they're not pure pacifists. They will wield their swords relentlessly against any who are recognized as the gods' enemies. They also devote themselves fully to anyone they consider a friend, making them very loyal allies.
dictionary.fusion:
Let us pray together.
My faith is my strength.
dictionary.summon:
Do you need me?
I can sense your wish.
I will lend you my power.

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性３連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 祝福の剣

dictionary.description: A humanoid with large, pure-white wings on its back. Angels who have won numerous battles and considered as suitable commanders are called Archangels. People who have received their divine protection and extreme devotion can have their  minor wounds instantly healed by them. They are more than ruthless and will annihilate their enemy without hesitation.
dictionary.evolution:
The gods have
heard your prayers.
You have my strength!
dictionary.fusion:
Behold my glistening sword!
The day for the gods' enemies
to submit has come!
dictionary.summon:
My sword will condemn evil!
If you harbor no guilt you
then you've nothing to fear!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性４連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 天の柱

dictionary.description: A humanoid with heavenly white wings on its back. Though once thought to have been of the same species as Valkyries, this new species evolved from Archangels that were blessed with power from the gods thanks to their virtuoucity. They were likely mistakenly identified this way as though they have the personality of Angels, their roles are similar to that of Valkyries. Beautiful depictions of them clearing the skies of evil are depicted on the ceiling of the Veda Cathedral.
dictionary.evolution:
These are blessings from the gods!
Just look! My wings! My blades!
No evil can escape them!
dictionary.fusion:
I am humbled by the gods' grace!
My increasing power is proof of
their existance!
dictionary.summon:
This blade granted to me is
proof the gods have blessed me!
Rejoice, child of man!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: ミラージュホーン

dictionary.description: A mythical creature with a single large horn on its brow. It resembles a beautiful white horse, and rarely gets close to humans. It will only open its heart to those with unstained souls. They can sense ulterior motives immediately thanks to their telepathy. Many try to capture them for the medicine in their horns, but usually end up getting pierced instead.
dictionary.fusion:
You heart is pure.
I hope you stay that way.
dictionary.summon:
Child who stands before me,
heed these words...
Beware your impure heart.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性７連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: トルネードチャージ

dictionary.description: A mythical creature with a huge horn on its brow and beautiful wings on its back. Contrary to its elegant appearance, it's very violent, and trying to ride one is a massive undertaking. Originally created as a vehicle for the gods, only a hero respected at the same level as a god can ride one. Those who see one on the battlefield fear the rider more than the beast itself.
dictionary.evolution:
You have given me wings.
I can see you have wings in
your heart, too.
dictionary.fusion:
Get on my back.
I'll take you far
above the clouds
dictionary.summon:
My wings belong to you
in all your purity.
Can I trust you with them?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: スカイウォードグレイヴ

dictionary.description: A mythical beast with a virtuous sword attached to its forehead, and rainbow wings covering its back. Said to be the sacred horse which pulled the tanks of the God Army, or a divine beast that can cut through the darkness, this creature is considered the best creation the gods ever made. The blade on its forehead is sharper than any sword humans are capable of producing, and it is said to be particularly effective when cutting down demons. For this reason Remuihl is believed to be a natural enemy of the demon race, and has thus come to adorn the temples of many countries as a charm of protection against evil.
dictionary.evolution:
You now possess the sword of light.
I will destroy anything in your path.
dictionary.fusion:
My wings are shining.
This is proof of your noble heart.
You should be proud.
dictionary.summon:
My horn will crush all evil.
If your heart is untrue,
I shall cut you in half.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 心の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 聖なる祈り

dictionary.description: A priestess who preached of the gods in the ruined La Veda Republic. Her piety made her powerful, and there are many miracles on record said to have been performed by her. Rumor was that Maria helped carry the gods because of the large wings extending from her back which spread when she'd perform a miracle. However, she obstinately denied this, saying she was just a normal person.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
Let us give our thanks
to the gods.
dictionary.summon:
I wish to know the gods' will!
Do you as well? If so, then
please let me help you!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復
bb.name: 聖女の福音

dictionary.description: A priestess who boasted of her belief in the gods in the ruined La Veda Republic. Helping many people through supposed miracles, she continued to preach the gods' teachings, eventually earning her the nickname, Angel. Yet when the war began, the judgement of the gods concerned her. She held her piety, and continued to plead with the gods, desiring to know their motive.
dictionary.evolution:
My path has been revealed!
I can see a peaceful world!
dictionary.fusion:
I feel a great light.
Let us give thanks for the presence of the gods!
dictionary.summon:
I can see it, a future where
god and man are at peace.
Let us welcome this future!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復
bb.name: 信仰の祈祷

dictionary.description: A priestess who preached of the gods in the ruined La Veda Republic. After the war with the gods began she received a lot of criticism from the people, however she held no resentment toward either god or man, and used her healing powers indiscriminately on both. Seeing her in action, a goddess decided to grant her even more power. It's unknown why the goddess bestowed such power to a human, but it's undeniable how many lives that act saved.
dictionary.evolution:
I have faith in everything.
You've no need to worry.
Select the path you believe in.
dictionary.fusion:
Your energy feels warm to me.
It's the same as that which the
goddess bestowed to me.
dictionary.summon:
Let us fight together to
put an end to this war.
The gods must be judged.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の真心

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: スターエアレイド

dictionary.description: A warrior of light who traverses battlefield after battlefield on a mission from the gods. They're a different species from humans despite their human-with-wings appearance. As there are only females, they are still being studied to see how they maintain their species. Legend has is that the gods left them to defend the world. They have sword to protect the world from evil.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel the light.
I will use my blade to
share this with the world.
dictionary.summon:
I've waited so very
long for this moment.
I devote myself to you.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ヴァルキリーテンペスト

dictionary.description: A war goddess who wielded her sword in the name of divine justice. The gods revealed that her mission was to destroy all evil. She was called the goddess of victory as she always won when fighting with the blessing of the gods. Many soldiers prayed to her before battle, though she was neutral during the war. Today, she still helps Summoners, but no one yet knows her true motive.
dictionary.evolution:
I can hear the gods.
My mission is to fight
with you.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
I will lead you to
absolute victory.
dictionary.summon:
The time has come!
Time to raise my sword!
Onward to battle!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: スターライド・レイ

dictionary.description: A goddess who worked hard to save humans when the gods invaded. However, she sided with them not out of compassion, but because she knew siding with them would allow her to fight an even stronger foe. She kept notes on all the strongest gods, humans, and beasts. However, what happened to those written in Jona's notes is unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
There is a light that only
shines in the middle of battle.
Let me show you this light!
dictionary.fusion:
You seem a worthy ally.
I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't
mind helping me out sometime.
dictionary.summon:
My name is Jona.
I was born to fight!
Let's bask in victory's glory!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 光の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: スタークルセイド

dictionary.description: This goddess is the living manifestation of war, known as Legendary Jona's true form while on the battlefield. Her motives are plain and simple: challenging the strong means everything. Records state that she fought to save the human race, but this is not completely true. The reason being that as soon as she had finished bringing down a powerful god, she then pointed her sword at a human hero. The blade that had once carried the hopes of the human race would now bring despair instead.
dictionary.evolution:
Battle and battle to the bitter end.
Fighting is living.
I shall teach this to you.
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks for the offerings.
However, what I really want
is to fight you now.
dictionary.summon:
Let us run around the battlefield
and bask in the glory of victory!
Come, we leave immediately!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 光創神の結界

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１７連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: エクセリオン

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性５連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: ホーリーレイ

dictionary.description: A pistoleer from another world that appeared on the outskirts of the ruined La Veda Republic. It's said he was a town sheriff. In Grand Gaia he continued eliminating villains with his other-worldly pistol, defending the justice he believed in. Children imitated him aiming his gun, saying, "I judge the evil the law can't reach."
dictionary.fusion:
I accept this strength,
and promise to use it to
protect the people.
dictionary.summon:
How rare, a Summoner!
Hey, take me with you.
I'll bring my pistol along.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: スターチルドレン

dictionary.description: A pistoleer from another world active on the outskirts of the ruined La Veda Republic, Heidt defeated villains with his lone pistol, and came to be known as the Holy Marksman. Women loved him, but he refused them , so it was said he likely had a wife back in his home world. He fought hard in the war, yet his death was not recorded. Rumor is that he had returned to his world.
dictionary.evolution:
Fine, I'll show you.
Show you how to use
a pistol, that is!
dictionary.fusion:
You think I need more power?
Alright, I'll get even stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Holy Marksman?
Nah, I'm just a pistoleer.
I'll come with, if that's OK.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性１１連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: スターバスター

dictionary.description: A pistoleer from another world active on the outskirts of the ruined La Veda Republic. As the war grew in intensity, Heidt disappeared for a period of time. He eventually returned, brandishing a massive gun, and with a confident devil-may-care smile on his face he said, "Ha ha ha. I was scolded for not having properly finished what I came here to do!" It's said that no one since has been able to match his superior shooting skills.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolution is easy, you know.
All it takes is a kind word from a girl
to motivate a man to improve himself.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey now!
Is that all you've got?
Let's give it a little more!
dictionary.summon:
Guns can be used for different reasons.
Some are good and some are bad.
How do you plan to use mine?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性２０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: スターゲイザー

dictionary.description: A gunner who made his living in the La Veda Republic. After a defeat from the God Army seemed imminent during the great war, he wondered the outskirts of town searching for anyone who hadn't been able to evacuate. Those who were rescued by Heidt often wished to fight by his side, helping him to rescue a great number of people. Even after finding out that the people he had saved were convicted criminals, Heidt did not hold it against them. The only thing he ever mentioned about them was written in a letter to his wife, which read that he "had been pointing his gun towards the wrong enemy the whole time."
dictionary.evolution:
If the gods are enemies,
then neither justice nor evil exists.
So I will create justice of my own!
dictionary.fusion:
Heh, a drink before battle,
and another after victory.
There's nothing better!
dictionary.summon:
Guns and humans can be used
for justice or for evil.
You should use your power well too!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇神の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２０連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: メテオストリーム

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: ドラゴンボイス

dictionary.description: A fairly common dragon in Grand Gaia. They're often seen on clear days, leisurely weaving through the clouds. They don't have interest in humans and don't get involved unless necessary. With a strong sense of justice rarely seen among dragons, they bring terror to those they deem evil, regardless of species. The wyvern's roar makes those with evil souls hide in fear.
dictionary.fusion:
My intentions are just.
How about yours?
dictionary.summon:
Can you handle this mission?
Then show me, just how much
can humans bear.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ジェノサイドブラスター

dictionary.description: Among the many dragons, there is a giant, extremely powerful dragons that go by the name Bahamut. They swoop down and suppress conflicts and disputes between other dragons. Their judgement is always fair, and no one ever objects. When someone has been judged to have harmed nature, Bahamut passes divine punishment as a representative of all dragons.
dictionary.evolution:
I will be the signpost
that lights your path.
dictionary.fusion:
If you hold justice within you,
you can use my strength as you will.
dictionary.summon:
The gods have alread decided.
I am the will of this world.
Can you bear the earth's will?

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: 天竜砲テスタメント

dictionary.description: The strongest and highest ranked in the history of all dragons, Rameldria engaged in many battles with many beings, even gods. This can be traced back to myths from long ago. None who lost to Rameldria were recorded as having survived, and it's believed that when the world is on the verge of abyssal despair, its tremendous power will return once again.
dictionary.evolution:
So you've come to fight.
Let my strength be your
weapon.
dictionary.fusion:
Can you hear the angry
voice of the planet?
dictionary.summon:
I can feel your intention.
If you're really planning on
exceed the heavens, I'll help.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ホーリーブラスター

dictionary.description: Recorded in legend, Rameldria was said to be one of the strongest of all the dragons, though few know the legend didn't stop there. In a few remaining stories it is told that Rameldria, once thought to be invincible, was actually once defeated by a human. Instead of being embarrassed by this, Rameldria instead showed respect toward the human. Then, having been accepted by the humans, with a bright flash of light it evolved into Duelmex.
dictionary.evolution:
I am the great Duelmex.
My power exists to purify
this world!
dictionary.fusion:
I may have friends,
but no one stands in my way!
I will obliterate all enemies!
dictionary.summon:
Death to all who do wrong
and have no value to society!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

50105.name: 覇神竜デュエルメクス

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
sbb.name: スターダストフレア

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２連ダメージ
bb.name: ギャラクシーバレット

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined La Veda Republic, history books say he was the only one who fought against the world's destruction until the very end. He was known as the strongest warrior in the Veda cavalry. People wanted to know if he was stronger than Atro, but legend claims he didn't care, saying, "What would it matter?"
dictionary.fusion:
Strength is always necessary,
even in something as simple
as keeping one's faith.
dictionary.summon:
Are you worthy of me
dedicating my sword to you?
Let me measure your worth.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: セイグリットフォース

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined La Veda Republic. He resisted the world's destruction until the very end. He is excellent at the sword, and great as a commander. His tactics steadily wore down his enemies. Deeply trusted by his soldiers, after a soldier proclaimed, "I know not if he's stronger than Atro, but he is most definately more overwhelming!" he harshly rebuked that soldier.
dictionary.evolution:
My sword is full of light!
This is evolution!
dictionary.fusion:
We need strength to save
the world. I feel very
strongly about that.
dictionary.summon:
This light... Who are you?
I swear by my sword that I will save the world. Let's go!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: アストラル・ノヴァ

dictionary.description: A knight from the ruined La Veda Republic who resisted the world's destruction until the very end. He anticipated the human loss at an early stage of the war, and in order to delay it he implemented a strange tactic, using a smaller forces to take on larger armies. The strategy was promising, but Will struggled until the end, knowing humanity would ultimately lose.
dictionary.evolution:
In this new form,
I will save the world!
dictionary.fusion:
We need strength to save
the world. I feel very
strongly about that.
dictionary.summon:
Oh, great light!
Grant this Summoner glory
and victory!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: イシュタルバーン

dictionary.description: A knight of the La Veda Republic that fought against the world's destruction until the very end. Charged by Lucius was saving the world, he deciding to give up command and return to being a lone knight. Informing his subordinates to follow Lucius' commands, he equipped himself with various sacred items before taking on the gods by himself. Free from the responsibility of command, Will, and the soldiers who decided to follow him anyway, cut down countless gods.
dictionary.evolution:
How vain a form.
Power should exist as a means
to carry out one's will.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't know if there's anything
left to protect anymore.
Still, I will never give up!
dictionary.summon:
You who dare defy fate.
Let us fight together!
We can decide the future!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 光彩神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１０連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ
sbb.name: アヴァロン

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: イシュタルキャリバー

dictionary.description: A knight who fought against the world's destruction until the very end. As he continued to fend off the invading God Army, a knight appeared before him. This knight had been a fellow villager who had sworn his allegiance to the gods. When the knight asked Will why he kept fighting if there was no one left for him to protect, Will answered that someone in need of his power may appear, and therefore he had to make sure to survive until the end. He then drew his sword anew as the last living human in Grand Gaia.
dictionary.evolution:
The curse cast upon Grand Gaia
has turned into hope. This is
my reward for fighting faithfully!
dictionary.fusion:
I have no one left to protect.
Nevertheless, I'll continue fighting.
That's what I've chosen.
dictionary.summon:
There is nothing as cruel
as being left with a snip of hope.
I want to ease his suffering someday.

extra skill.desc: 「神器」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与」を追加
extra skill.name: 未来へ捧げる力

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 光聖凱神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性３５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
sbb.name: ローエングリン

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２２連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆攻撃力・防御力を１ターン超絶低下＆味方全体に２ターン、闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを超絶軽減
ubb.name: アルビオン

dictionary.description: A small nymph thought to be born from light, one of the six elements made by the gods. It's mischievous and likes startling travelers in the dark with a blinding light. It's popular with Summoners for its ability to give special powers to others, but it hates being captured and only goes along with those it likes. There are also unvalidated rumors that it can be malicious at times.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Light Nymph, pew!
You seem interesting.
Lemme go with you, pew!

dictionary.description: A spirit that rules light, one of the six elements created by the gods. The light from its body is luminous enough to brighten any dark place. However, since the light it emits is so strong, it is difficult to look at it for a long time. It worries about this and is often irritated by it. Legends has it that people who receive strength from Light Spirits have their dormant powers awoken.
dictionary.summon:
Pew, pew, pew!
So annoying, pew!
Just fuse me already, pew!

dictionary.description:
Worshipers of light gave this miraculous stone idol life through prayer. It's said that the holy power it holds can call forth mysterious powers sleeping in all life.
Its discoverer was attracted to its divinity, got too close and then took a severe blow from it. It's called the "light-beard giant" since beams of light are seen emitting from its mouth.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Light Idol.
It seems you know my purpose.
I will go with you.

dictionary.description: Created by the gods, it embodies light's power. Legend is that those whom the great gods deem worthy can gain their power. Its huge wings sparkle in seven colors, and it's said to be an omen as it appears during auroras. The Light Totem is the gods' executor, not handing down judgments itself, but instead appearing after a decision has already been made.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Light Totem.
You would be wise to use my
godly powers responsibly.

dictionary.description: A monster that shimmers all over. It likes eating gemstones, but as it can't digest them it instead stores them inside itself. It is often referred to as a moving treasure chest. Many Summoners try to capture them, but they're fast and not very common. One must be proficient in finding them to be able to capture one. It, the Jewel King and the Jewel God are classified as jewel types.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Jewel Ghost!
I twinkle beautifully, don't I?
Let's be friends!

dictionary.description: A bigger, hungrier version of a Jewel Ghost. Since the gems it eats also remain inside of it, it is highly valued, even more so than the Jewel Ghost. Some Summoners search them out in order to get rich quick, but they are usually ruined by searching expenses. They are sometimes called foolish, and are often subject to ridicule.
dictionary.summon:
Oh, I'm full.
Hmm? You have more for me?
Then I guess I'm hungry again!

dictionary.description: A jewel type monster that is even larger and even more voracious than the Jewel King. Not only does it hold the gems it's eaten in its body, but those gems also merge together producing even more precious jewels making it is even more valuable than the others. Naturally, there are many Jewel God related crimes, there being a high number of counterfeits, abductions, and scams.
dictionary.summon:
I can still eat.
Give me more gems, please!
My belly is bottomless!

dictionary.description: A jewel type monster that makes even a Jewel God look tiny. Its existence had been rumored since long ago, but there were many who didn't believe in its existence nowadays. Contrary to Jewel Gods, it fuses the precious jewels it ingests and makes beautiful stones unlike anyone has ever seen. It has so many precious stones in its stomach that their glow is manifested even in its outer appearance. One can sell this god for a lot of money, but to buy one, one must be a millionaire.
dictionary.summon:
Are you gonna feed me?
I'm a glutton,
so you better prepare yourself!

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: ブレイブエッジ

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined La Veda Republic. Traveling the world with her adventurer parents since childhood helped her easily surpass most other swordsmen. However, the day after she turned 16, her parents disappeared, leaving her an old ring and a letter reading, "Head for the legendary ancient ruins." She immediatlely set out on her solo journey with nothing more than an old ring and the letter her parents left.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion is great.
With it it's so easy to
get back my strength.
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner, eh?
I guess I can help a little!
And I'll be watching you!

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ブレイブインパクト

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined La Veda Republic, she was known as an adventurer who traveled around ancient ruins in search of her parents. Her adventures, like when she vanquished an evil spirit, or her times travelling through unexplored jungles, inspired her. More than glory, she just wanted to find her parents.
dictionary.evolution:
Haha, I've gotten stronger!
Now take me somewhere
more exciting!
dictionary.fusion:
Don't think this is
all I've got. I have a
lot more stored up inside.
dictionary.summon:
Wanna go on an adventure?
Great! Let's have some fun!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 力の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: スターダストフォール

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the ruined La Veda Republic. She found her parents at some ancient ruins, but her joy was short lived. They had blocked the ruins' destructive power by binding themselves to them. Ignoring their pleas to be allowed to suppress the power with their lives, Alma defeated it herself. Her adventures ended, and she was known soforth as a hero for both preventing a catastrophe and for saving her parents.
dictionary.evolution:
Come with me!
With my strength we can go
anywhere you want to!
dictionary.fusion:
My power is overflowing!
My strength has returned along
with all my memories!
dictionary.summon:
I've been waiting for you!
Let's start our adventure
to save the world!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 力の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: ホワイトエスペランサー

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the La Veda Republic. After her travels ended and she'd saved her parents, they all went back to their hometown for the first time in a long time. However, their peaceful days were brought to an end by the invasion of the gods, at which time they left as a family to protect the people. During the intense battle Alma's mastered her sword technique, though her parents displayed even greater mastery and strength. At first Alma was surprised to see this, but eventually she just smiled as she continued her piercing attack.
dictionary.evolution:
A new adventure!
Alright, let's get going!
I'm waiting!
dictionary.fusion:
It's time to train.
I want to be able to surprise
my mother and father.
dictionary.summon:
What do you think?
I'm a quick learner, eh?
Are you surprised?

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ
bb.name: ヴァリアントセイヴァー

dictionary.description: A swordswoman from the La Veda Republic. As a knight of La Veda, Alma fought to protect everyone in and out of her reach. However, the numbers of the God Army became too great, and eventually she was cornered in her own home. Inside was her father, who fell trying to protect his daughter from danger. When Alma panicked as she saw her father mortally wounded, he scolded her strictly and then passed onto her the great power he had used to wield his ancient axe. Using this new power, Alma was successfully able to defend herself and her dying father from the perilous situation at hand.
dictionary.evolution:
This power isn't mine alone.
My father made me stronger.
So I won't lose to anyone!
dictionary.fusion:
My father told me never to give up.
That's why I've decided
to grow even stronger!
dictionary.summon:
You know, my father smiled
even in the harshest of times.
I refuse to cry any longer!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の覇動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: ギャラクシーグランツ

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ドラゴンスレイヤー

dictionary.description: A swordsman who became a knight in order to follow in the steps of his hero, Will of the Republic of La Veda. As a new knight recruit, Aem trained day and night to become as nimble and agile as Will. It was Will himself who suggested he swap his weapon for a broadsword, a major adjustment that brought with it a whole new world of tactical possibilities. After that, Aem swung his sword at least 10 thousand times a day, and soon became recognized as a true talent among his fellow knights.
dictionary.fusion:
You want to fuse with me?
I don’t know if I’ll be of any
use to you, but you’re welcome to try.
dictionary.summon:
It is an honor to be chosen
by you, kind Summoner.
Aem, at your service.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 力の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: ゴッドスレイヤー

dictionary.description: A swordsman who became a knight in order to follow in the steps of his hero, Will of the Republic of La Veda. Will’s most devoted follower, Aem couldn’t bear the way Will and Atro appeared to be held in equal regard by his peers. Convinced of Will’s superiority, Aem challenged Atro to a joust. The joust was called off halfway through, but Aem’s reputation was sealed as the knight who’d managed to hold his own against the legendary Atro.
dictionary.evolution:
The weight of this sword
isn’t any ordinary weight:
It is the weight of chivalry!
dictionary.fusion:
I am not worthy to be mentioned
in the same breath as these heroes.
I have much yet to learn.
dictionary.summon:
I bestow upon you this sword
as one knight’s vow to another.
Go forth, gentle warrior.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 力の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: レディアントヘヴン

dictionary.description: A swordsman who became a knight in order to follow in the steps of his hero, Will of the Republic of La Veda. Even when he was hailed as one of the top five knights in the Veda clan, Aem’s intense feelings of respect for Will never changed. As the world descended into chaos, Aem stood resolutely at Will’s side, and continued to discharge his duties with loyalty and precision. It is said that his final moments were spent heroically attempting to protect Will from the gods’ onslaught.
dictionary.evolution:
With this sword in my palm,
let us vanquish all who
would be thorns in our side.
dictionary.fusion:
No matter what accolades people
bestow upon me, I merely follow
the one I believe in.
dictionary.summon:
I pledge my unwavering allegiance.
My blade and I are yours to use
as you see fit.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の鼓動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: オルビットグロウ

dictionary.description: A swordsman who became a knight in order to follow in the steps of his hero. After La Veda fell, he chased after Will who had broke off on his own and was about to challenge the gods. After catching up to him Will rebuked him, to which Aem responded, "It is the hope of all the people to see Sir Will safely through battle with the gods." It is said that, as Will smiled cheerfully, Aem stood in front of him and continued to counter the gods' attacks.
dictionary.evolution:
I've realized my faults.
Devotion doesn't mean
blindly following others!
dictionary.fusion:
Power, fill my blade!
Give me the power to
destroy my enemies!
dictionary.summon:
Your energy is so warm.
I swear to become your blade!
Allow me to fight alongside you!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の脈動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: フラメントボンド

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ハルシオンハック

dictionary.description: The woman warrior who wore 8 blades on her back. At the time there was no one who knew where she came from, where she was headed, or what she was after. There weren't even many who had the chance to speak with her. However, her actions were witnessed in many lands far and wide as she went from place to place, vanquishing otherworldly beings that were causing havoc. It is said that as mystical as she seemed, she still struck fear in the hearts of any who saw her.
dictionary.fusion:
My power increases with
every ray of light that dwells
within my 8 blades.
dictionary.summon:
What is it you want?
I see...
OK, I will lend you my power.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ディストラクトチェイン

dictionary.description: The woman warrior who wore 8 blades on her back. Though she had buried countless hordes of raging otherworldly beings, she was once found covered in blood. According to witness account, an enemy of hers was able to evade her 8 blade attack, upon which they instantly countered back. Her enemy left her behind, spouting at her "How dull!" before departing. This left her to once again acknowledge her weakness, being that the blades on her back were for casting judgment and were not there for her own protection.
dictionary.evolution:
My blades have been whetted.
Though sharp, they are fragile.
Do you understand what I mean?
dictionary.fusion:
I must sharpen my blades...
Fret not, for my will lies
within them as well.
dictionary.summon:
I've been summoned?
I must fight again?
I guess I must if it's an order...

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: クリナップジハード

dictionary.description: The woman warrior who wore 8 blades on her back. After the war with the gods started, she continued on as always, obliterating targets with her 8 blades. However in records starting from the humans' decline during the war, a quote from her appeared, despite the fact she had never been mentioned herself up until that point. It read, "My part is finished. Now that it's almost over, allow me to use your strength." There currently exists no one who understands what she meant by that statement.
dictionary.evolution:
This is where my will resides.
My powerful new form is
yours to command.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel your will...
It has made me stronger...
Is this my true power?
dictionary.summon:
What is it you fight for?
If I can help to protect you,
please use me as you will.

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ローグバインドフェンサー

dictionary.description: The woman warrior who wore 8 blades on her back. Throwing away the responsibility she had been given of judging otherworldly beings, she turned her blades on the gods. In the heat of battle, she once again came face to face with an old foe. The smell of blood drifting through the air, she swore that if she was able to survive the battle that they would fight just the two of them once again. As she said this, blades shot out from the back of the wicked creature that stood before her.
dictionary.evolution:
Focus on your mission in life.
I will be your sword and cut
open for you a path forward!
dictionary.fusion:
What's the meaning of fighting?
Hehe, I've never even thought
of such a thing before.
dictionary.summon:
I entrust my eight blades to you.
Let us decide together at whom
we will use them on!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 光閃神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする＆自分のＢＣ出現率を少しアップ
sbb.name: アトミック・ノヴァ

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１７連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ローグライドスレイヴ

dictionary.description: The woman warrior who wore 8 blades on her back. As Sefia fought alongside Kikuri against the gods, the clash of their enormous powers opened the door to another world, drawing them inside. What happened to her afterwards remains a mystery, but some say that she finally made good on her promise to fight Kikuri, only to end up caught up in a long battle to the death that never reached a conclusion. A fragment of her eight blades would be discovered centuries later, apparently still attached to a piece of scarlet cloth when it was found.
dictionary.evolution:
Seems I involved myself again
with the world beyond this one.
Will I relive those feelings anew?
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel my power growing here.
Now I understand.
I finally understand how she felt.
dictionary.summon:
The gods weren't enough for me. She
was the only one who made me whole.
Together we were strong.

extra skill.desc: 「八神剣オージュブライト」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 光輝なる意志

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 光閃斬神の力

50166.name: 神剣の聖皇姫セフィア

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺を発生する効果を付与・ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ラグネイド・ノヴァ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２６連ダメージ＆攻撃力を１ターン超絶低下＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加
ubb.name: クラウ・ソラス

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: パワーチャージ

dictionary.description: A horned rabbit that inhabits a small part of Grand Gaia. They are herbivores, but they are very territorial and indiscriminately lay waste to anyone who steps foot in their territory. One can crush a stone with a full on attack making use of the tremendous spring power in its hind legs. They are, however, sometimes seen struggling to get their horn free, having rammed it through something and getting it stuck. The scream of an Al-mi'raj that's gotten its horn stuck up high and is unable to stand on the ground is enough to make anyone who hears it tremble.
dictionary.fusion:
Kip, kip, kiiip!
Kiiiip, kip...
Kip, kip, kiiip!
dictionary.summon:
K-Kiiiiiip!!
Kip, kip, kip, kiiip!!

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ベルセルク

dictionary.description: A feline monster with 3 horns. This Al-mi'raj mutation may look like a cat, but its personality is extremely ferocious. Even when tamed, it's difficult to get it to follow orders. Using both its claws and horns to tear up any prey careless enough to get close, Cait Sith's have also been called the "Slice and Dice Fur Ball" in the wild. There are some enthusiasts who prize their pet Cait Siths as hunting cats which they use to capture Imps and Incubus's.
dictionary.evolution:
Meow!?
Meow, meooooow!!
dictionary.fusion:
Meooooow!
Purrrrrr!!
dictionary.summon:
Puuurr!
Meeeeeeeeooow!!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＨＣ出現率を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 心の輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 祝福の祈祷

dictionary.description: A shrine maiden said to have descended from a group of people from another world that inhabited the mountains in the La Veda Republic. These people didn't pray to the gods of Grand Gaia but to the stars and held the unique belief that they could read fortunes with them. Though the young Amul's fortune telling abilities weren't yet developed, her skills with a blade led to her sticking out as one who would one day protect her people. However, she wished to incrise her fortune telling skills, and disliked it when monsters provoked her.
dictionary.fusion:
Umm...
I don't need to train...
I mean...forget it.
dictionary.summon:
I am Amul, I can read
the future in the stars.
Please let me go with you.

leader skill.desc: 女性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 可憐なる力

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 生命の祈祷

dictionary.description: A shrine maiden said to have descended from a group of people from another world that inhabited the mountains in the La Veda Republic. As Amul vanquished monster after monster, sacrificing sleep and food to train her fortune telling abilities, she became proficient in both and her techniques were soon second to none among her people. Amul's spiritual power was stronger than any before her and it was said that she had the power to tell all things from the arrangement of the stars, and was even able to predict the movement of monsters.
dictionary.evolution:
What a favorable constellation.
Thanks to the stars and you
it seems it's time to evolve!
dictionary.fusion:
The stars have aligned.
It's a good time to train.
Let's get stronger!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Amul the fortune teller.
I foretold you would come.
Let us chase our fate!

leader skill.desc: 女性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 可憐なる力

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of light. As gentle and friendly to humans as it may be, it has a tendency to test those who wish to make the power it has hidden in its pot their own, making it likely very difficult to get ahold of. One also mustn't forget that simply touching the horn on its head can send it into a rage.
dictionary.summon:
Do you know fully
how to use my pot?
Hey! No touching the horn!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal Ghost is said to have changed after having amassed extensive records on the element of light. It is called the most unlucky of the metal record species, and not just because of the amount of knowledge it holds within itself, but also because of the various things that come out of its mouth. The element of light is much stronger in them than in normal Metal Ghosts, and it's said that when fused to other light types they provide loads more experience as well.
dictionary.summon:
Fusion! Fusion!
Hehe! Everyone's happy
when I'm used in fusion!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal King is said to hold within its large body a huge collection of information on the element of light. They are referred to as "Metal Heroes" in collective research documents relating to the metal record species. What exactly the Metal Kings did to become known as heroes is unrecorded, but it seems everyone around them finds what they say somehow fascinating.
dictionary.evolution:
Look at me!
Am I too bright for you?
This is my true form!
dictionary.summon:
Feel it!
The breath of the metal records!
This is our power!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. They have a very relaxed personality, and, despite them being a subspecies, they are considered the elders of the metal record species. They also have a great variety of knowledge which is not just useful in improving the lives of members of their fellow species, but is also used to give useful advice to humans which has helped them to gain recognition among normal people, too.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner,
we don't mind being fused but
please use us wisely.

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ガバスブレイク

dictionary.description:
Rumored to live somewhere in Grand Gaia on an island called "Famitsu Island," the young Nekky from the island of plentiful amusement, asking himself "What truly makes something fun?" departed on an adventure to search for that very answer. Despite his small stature, he bounced about as he made easy work of his enemies, knocking them down one after another.
*Nekky is the mascot for Famitsu, Japan's No. 1 game media outlet.
dictionary.fusion:
More power for me?
Thank you!
Let's start our adventure!
dictionary.summon:
I'm glad to have met you!
Let's go on an adventure to
find the perfect game!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: ファミ通Appの力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: ファイナルガバスブレイク

dictionary.description:
Rumored to live somewhere in Grand Gaia on an island called "Famitsu Island," Nekky departed in search of "What truly makes something fun." The heroic tales of how he traveled around vanquishing monsters who dared peddle fake amusements are still tremendously popular with boys and girls today. He would often say, "Let's continue our search for the greatest game ever!"
*Nekky is the mascot for Famitsu, Japan's No. 1 game media outlet.
dictionary.evolution:
Thank you!
I appreciate your thoughts!
Please summon me anytime!
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel your
presence all around me!
You've got true potential!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: ファミ通Appの力

dictionary.description:
Rumored to live somewhere in Grand Gaia on an island called "Famitsu Island," Nekky was greeted by some Metal Ghosts who had gotten lost and found their way to him. Impressed by how charming he was, the Metal Ghosts began training with Nekky. Once the intense training had finished, Nekky stood anew, glistening with white light.
*Nekky is the mascot for Famitsu, Japan's No. 1 game media outlet.
dictionary.fusion:
You're giving me more power?
Don't worry about me,
give some power to the others!
dictionary.summon:
How do I appear to you?
Anyway, feel free to
use me as you like!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: ファミ通Appの力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: フラッシュアロー

dictionary.description: A girl from the La Veda Republic. One day she was attacked by a thief, and later rescued by one of the Six Heroes, Atros. Having fallen in love at first sight with Atros, she undertook a rigorous examination to enter knighthood in order to learn the art of the sword from Atros himself. However, after becoming a part of the order, she then discovered that Atros was not a member of the knighthood there. Heartbroken, Will , the leader of the knights, tried to comfort her by stating that "her form with a bow was a thing of beauty." Somehow misunderstanding, she took up the bow and one year later had already become the best archer in the republic.
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks!
I wonder if with this
I'll be able to be by Atro's side.
dictionary.summon:
Ahhh! That hurt!
Oh, wonderful Summoner...
I'll become your ally!

leader skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 魔力の漲充

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: シャイニングアロー

dictionary.description: An archer from the La Veda Republic. Having joined the order of knights in the republic to get closer to Atros, once she became a knight her interest shifted towards their leader, Will. A senior knight by the name of Aem used to look at her with suggestive eyes, but she took this as a sign of his interest in her. With an incredible talent for the art of war, her reputation grew in other countries, praising her machine-like precision shooting skills, and outstanding speed. This daughter of a noble came to be a figure to be both admired and feared.
dictionary.evolution:
Taro, and Will, and Aem isn't bad either...
Oh, what?!
When did I evolve?!
dictionary.fusion:
What do you think?
I got better again, didn't I?
I wonder if Will and Aem will fall even deeper for me now!
dictionary.summon:
My bow and arrow will go shoot straight through your heart!
Hehe. I wish!

leader skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力をアップ
leader skill.name: 魔力の溢出

bb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復
bb.name: プリティバトルキッス♪

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Tilith, the goddess who serves Lucius and governs the Gate. There's a rumor that the success of the goddess's mock Unit was thanks to information obtained from Summoner Hall authorities who were in contact with her. However, this information didn't explicit how to recreate the goddess's true power, therefore the resulting Unit is far weaker. There's still a long way to go before the "beautifully indomitable goddess" can be recreated.
dictionary.fusion:
I've always been strong
so I really don't need to
train anymore!
dictionary.summon:
Hey, let's have some fun!
I look forward to all the wonderful
adventures we're sure to have!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを少し増加＆全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 女神の奇跡

bb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復
bb.name: ミラクルバトルキッス♪

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after the goddess Tilith. Her extremely high power could be seen in the way she outclassed her demonic opponents and from the countless other miraculous things she did. Also, the research facility's findings indicated that her powers may be even stronger than she had realized herself, and they've made it a point to hear from as many of the Summoners who've supported her as possible in continuing their research.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't let yourself be fooled
by how pretty I am.
I'm stronger than I look!
dictionary.fusion:
All this for me!?
Gosh, it sure is hard being a
pretty goddess like me!
dictionary.summon:
Hello there!
This goddess has descended
from above just for you!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加＆全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 虹女神の奇跡

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・雷・光属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: フラッシュエフェクト

dictionary.description: The oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. As gentle as she was, she could also be really stubborn. However there was no one who doubted her kindness, and it's said even Madia looked upon her with a pleasant smile. Sola rallied her sisters to fight in defense of the humans with her kindness, though this very act resulted in a battle between the sisters themselves.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't know what is right.
That is why I just react.
Are you any different?
dictionary.summon:
Alright, let's fight!
Show me your definition
of justice!

leader skill.desc: 炎・雷・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 聖光の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・雷・光属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: カテドラルフォトン

dictionary.description: The oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. She enlisted the help of her sisters in saving the humans when they were attacked by the gods. Amidst the fighting, three of her sisters, having witnessed the humans' evil deeds, decided to join the fight against them instead. Sola was then forced to face off against the three Fresh Blood Sisters, and it's said her battle with Madia was particularly fierce. It's uncertain how the battle ended, but what is known for sure is that none of them were ever seen again.
dictionary.evolution:
I promise to use this power
for the sake of all humans.
I don't want to fight my sisters.
dictionary.fusion:
You've no need to worry
about losing your faith.
It matters not what happens.
dictionary.summon:
Show me how wonderful
you humans can really be!
I know you have it in you!

leader skill.desc: 炎・雷・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 聖光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・雷・光属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: セラフラディエイション

dictionary.description: The oldest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. Seeing how her younger sister Madia had gone mad with hatred against human kind, Sola sought to exorcise the darkness that had taken over her younger sister in order to bring about peace. Watching as Madia fell prisoner to the scorn within her, Sola shed tears of grief for her sister as she attacked her. Madia's condition seemed to worsen over time, but holding on to the belief that her sister would recover, Sola continued her assault. Hoping that one day the sisters could laugh together again as they had long ago, Sola finally released her true power.
dictionary.evolution:
I will rid you of the doubt
consuming your heart.
It is my duty to guide you!
dictionary.fusion:
It's no time to cry, is it?
If I don't get a hold of myself,
my sisters will mock me.
dictionary.summon:
Please, lend me your heart.
I beg of you.

leader skill.desc: 炎・雷・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２５％軽減
leader skill.name: 聖光創神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎・雷・光属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・雷・光属性を付与・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: イリス＝ヴィレ

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: シャイニングフォース

dictionary.description: Just before the gods attacked, it has been recorded that an angel descended upon the frozen Lake Lordahn in Lizeria. Its beautiful armor and the wings of light coming from its back were fitting for the messenger of the gods. However, without speaking a word he suddenly took up his blue flamed dual-tipped spear and one by one laid waste to the villages around him. Without evading, he took oncoming counterattacks with his armor, trampling down the people as they tried to escape.
dictionary.fusion:
My strength has returned.
But what is this?
What witchcraft is this?
dictionary.summon:
Who dares awaken me?
Do you think you have what
it takes to command me?

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊の衝動

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: シャイニングオーラ

dictionary.description: A ten-winged figure that appeared in Lizeria, tormenting its people even before the war with the gods had begun. Though his true identity remains unknown, many wonder if he was in fact part of the gods' initial attack given how he shined more with every life he took. After laying waste to a handful of villages, he was overtaken by a mysterious battalion. However, neither his body let alone his armor were left behind, leaving some to doubt that maybe he was just a product of the people's imagination.
dictionary.evolution:
I will evolve to complete my mission
It is one of the few things
I am allowed to do at will.
dictionary.fusion:
My strength is growing.
Summoner, what do you plan
to use my strength for?
dictionary.summon:
I've no need to worry about
what is right and what is wrong.
I only do as I am ordered.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の誘い

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: シャイニングセリカ

dictionary.description: A ten-winged figure that laid waste to Lizeria. Though Michele and her battalion overtook this tormentor, a mysterious light from above shone upon him, reviving him and making him stronger than ever. His evolved power was enough to knock the entire battalion onto the ground in an instant. Michele was the one courageous enough to face him again, attacking him with everything she had. Her actions inspired the rest to rise up and defeat him once and for all... or so they had thought. He still had another trick up his sleeve that could render all their efforts pointless.
dictionary.evolution:
Just keep calling my name.
I'll come back again and again.
And fiercer each time.
dictionary.fusion:
Light shines upon me from above.
This is just like when...
My memory fails me...
dictionary.summon:
The reason I exist,
is because I was given this power.
There is nothing else.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 破壊神の激震

sbb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷・光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与
sbb.name: ルシフェル

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷・光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: アスプロウス

dictionary.description: A ten-winged figure that laid waste to Lizeria. His identity turned out to be one of the "Six Armors" that had been created by a scientist from another world. Having been destroyed by DUEL-GX, another of the Six Armors, its functions came to a complete stop. However, after the people of Grand Gaia were eradicated by the gods, Melchio came back to life as a monstrous being very unlike his original self. He continued to fight the gods until his half-broken armor was completely destroyed, though the reasons behind this course of action remain unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
I am already... If not...
I...represent the gods...
I must...restore...order...
dictionary.fusion:
I shall...destroy the Fallen Gods...
Thus I need more power...
It's a promise I made...long ago...
dictionary.summon:
The world was already destroyed...
I...am...a vessel...
An...instrument...of the...gods...

extra skill.desc: 「白輝聖鎧メルキオ」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体の全状態異常を回復」を追加
extra skill.name: 神より授かりし魂

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を８０％アップ＆通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
leader skill.name: 虚壊神の凄震

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎・水・樹・雷・光属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光属性を付与・攻撃力に応じて防御力をアップ
sbb.name: べリアル＝クローズ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎・水・樹・雷・光属性２４連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効＆１ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減
ubb.name: 昏キ天魔ノ降臨

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加
bb.name: ソルアライズ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit based on Ark, who was once called the Oracle Knight. Ark was appointed as the protector of the Oracle Maiden, Ilia. When he was still a mere candidate for this position before the great war with the gods began, he is said to have had poor conduct, often quarreling with the other candidates for knighthood. However, he never lay a hand on any of them. When Ilia chose him to become the Oracle Knight he was finally able to demonstrate his true abilities, devoting them to fulfill the wishes of the Oracle Maiden.
dictionary.fusion:
I avoided my battles once,
but I won't run anymore. Thanks
for giving me the strength to fight.
dictionary.summon:
My name is Ark! I am the knight
who guards the Oracle Maiden.
I'll lend you my power, brave one!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を２０％アップ＆スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ・スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 神託の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性２５連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 神託の剣『ウィーゼル』

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加
bb.name: エクスレイヴ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit based on Ark, who was once called the Oracle Knight. Before the great war with the gods, the Oracle Maiden received a revelation from Lucius. He claimed that the Holy Emperor sought to destroy the human race, and thus Ark and the Oracle Maiden set off on a journey to slay him. Thanks to the many friends they made during their travels, Ark felt a new power awakening within him. This dormant power was finally unleashed when he attempted to save his friends during their decisive battle against the Holy Emperor. How Noel was able to get his hands on all this information though, remains unclear.
dictionary.evolution:
My desire to protect others
fused with our bonds of friendship,
and gave me this great power!
dictionary.fusion:
I must grow stronger for her sake.
I want to see that smile
that thawed my frozen heart!
dictionary.summon:
Courage is such an overused word.
But even so, let me say it.
Have courage, and let's keep going!

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復と確率でＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 神に愛された騎士

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を３５％アップ＆スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ・スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 神託の覇気

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性３２連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 断界の剣『アーステリオ』

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ・攻撃に全属性を付与
ubb.name: ソード・オブ・ブレイブ

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 防御レベル20発動

dictionary.description: A guardian weapon that can move autonomously which can be found in ancient ruins. It is believed that perhaps it came from another world, but there are a considerable number of these still active all over Grand Gaia. Now they inhabit populated areas, making it seem like they were meant to protect the humans around them. However, it seems like their contents have been scrambled somehow and thus have been reduced to nothing but weapons that attack any type of moving object. One should be careful when approaching their mysterious and round bodies.
dictionary.fusion:
Beep!
Beep! Beep!
Beeeeeeeep!
dictionary.summon:
Beep! Beep!
Boop! Boop!

leader skill.desc: 性別不明ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 純然たる力

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
bb.name: 防御レベル100発動

dictionary.description: A guardian weapon that can move autonomously which has a number of defense mechanisms controlled by its core. This rarely found guardian weapon has in essence come to disregard all its initial functions, and achieved evolution for the purpose of disposing of anything it considers hostile. It is believed that it was modified by someone for some particular purpose, but now it is nothing more but a machine which attacks anything that approaches it. Without a soul, and without a conscience, it has brought countless of warriors to their deaths.
dictionary.evolution:
Update...
Beep! Beep!
Complete.
dictionary.fusion:
Supply replenishment...
Beep, beep!
Complete.
dictionary.summon:
Registration...
Beep!
Complete.

leader skill.desc: 性別不明ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 純然たる力

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を少しアップ
bb.name: 輝獣の咆哮

dictionary.description: A white beast who served as the keeper of order and helped maintain peace. He was also known for keeping evil beings in order and bringing fair justice to those who deserved it. One day, a half blood girl came to take on the White Beast. Seeing through to her troubled heart, torn between two peoples who wouldn't accept her, the white beast advised her to act on her own behalf. Having opened her heart at these words, the white beast chose then to go along with her and keep watch over her.
dictionary.fusion:
So you wish to strengthen me.
How thoughtless of you to think
all there is to life is power.
dictionary.summon:
What is it that you're
fighting against, Summoner?
Is it worth it for me to join you?

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

50303.name: 百輝獣ホワイトレブラ

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: 輝獣王の大咆哮

dictionary.description: A white beast who served as the keeper of order and helped maintain peace. He headed to the battlefield with Lira and Golem where the Rebel Angel had already unleashed the disastrous beast. When they arrived, however, it was Elsel herself who was waiting for them. Going ahead of Lira and Golem, the white beast was the first to confront the Rebel Angel. Seeing through to how she was struggling with her newfound freedom, the white beast took on the brunt of her attack as he attempted to persuade her to stop.
dictionary.evolution:
If it's my power that you seek
then allow me to show you.
This is my true beastly form.
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner, do you act knowing
the true meaning of power?
If so, then let me be your blade.
dictionary.summon:
I am the keeper of order.
If I determine you to be just,
then my power is yours.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

50304.name: 輝獣王ルブラディーン

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: 輝神獣の大咆哮

dictionary.description: Despite being the Keeper of Order, this white beast bore his fangs to the gods. He disappeared after his battle with a certain angel, but appeared once again after the gods began their invasion. It is said his appearence had changed, and he was able to release his full power. Having recovered, pure white wings spread from his back as he raced toward the Half Blood Girl and the Rebel Angel who continued to resist the gods' invasion. As he fought alongside them the two, it is said the White Beast's roar rattled even the gods themselves.
dictionary.evolution:
The beast inside me has awaken.
You, who desires strength!
Let me show you my true form!
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner.
Forget not that with great power
comes great responsibility.
dictionary.summon:
Hear me roar!
I am the Keeper of Order,
Leorone, Shining King of all Beasts!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ・スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の闘光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ
sbb.name: ホワイトムーン

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: エーテルブラスター

dictionary.description: A mechanical weapon in the shape of a person that appeared from another world. She lost in her battle against the weapon her master had accidentally unleashed. The last thing she recorded before her systems shut down was an image of her defeated master and the gate to the other world, opened in the attack. After her systems were back online she noticed a man with long hair checking her over, but she ignored him, instead confirming the survival of her master and preparing herself to go to her aid.
dictionary.fusion:
Energy restoration complete.
Increase in proficiency of
basic functions confirmed.
dictionary.summon:
Scanning area...
Location confirmed.
Carrying out new orders.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な光属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: ディバインブラスター

dictionary.description: A mechanical weapon in the shape of a person that appeared from another world. Along with her master, she scoured the strange new land for the dangerous weapon that had sent them there. Though accompanied by a lightning wielding man who wanted nothing more than to study her and another whose incomprehensible propositions gave her pause, she somehow managed to complete her mission. Upon requesting orders from her master, she was fitted with a new weapon utilizing Grand Gaian technology.
dictionary.evolution:
Systems all green.
Version upgrade complete.
Waiting for orders, Master.
dictionary.fusion:
Energy input from
Master confirmed.
Rebooting data.
dictionary.summon:
You have been established
as my new Master.
Standing by for orders.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: アルカナブラスター

dictionary.description: A mechanical weapon in the shape of a person that appeared from another world. After they failed to destroy their target, her master retrofitted her with new technology. She started making adjustments of her own to her power nucleus as a last-ditch effort to thwart their enemy.
