However, it failed to activate when her master was in grave danger during the war with the gods. Knowing her master was aware of this, she vowed to protect her on her own, without the use of fancy technology. This in turn made her all the more stronger.
dictionary.evolution:
Malfunction.
Unanticipated heat detected within.
Correction... This sensation...
dictionary.fusion:
Weapons upgrade confirmed.
Energy level: 100 percent.
Maintenance mode complete.
dictionary.summon:
Summoning confirmed.
Orders unnecessary.
Your protection guaranteed.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な光属性１６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
sbb.name: エタニティフォース

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な光属性１８連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を大幅にアップ
bb.name: アクトリニアブラスター

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方のＢＢゲージを増加」を追加＆「氷輝天鎧レーゼ」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ
extra skill.name: 永遠なる忠誠

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光劫神の閃撃

sbb.desc: 敵単体に超強力な光属性２４連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆ＯＤゲージを少し増加
sbb.name: 限装解除：イオニアフォース

ubb.desc: 敵単体に超強力な光属性７連ダメージ＆敵全体に超強力な光属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: ＸＴＦ型 シーアブレイカー

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ・被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 光の障壁

dictionary.description: A heavily armored soldier who appears in the tales about the migration of a group of refugees towards El Gaia. His story began when Reed and his party helped him out of a predicament he he'd fallen into following an attack from the god army. Though he never swore fealty to Reed, it is said he would appear out of nowhere whenever one of the party members was in danger to rescue them. It has also been told that he'd offer advice at the time of the rescue, but apparently Aneil was the only one to take this advice seriously, while everyone else never really stopped to listen.
dictionary.fusion:
What a convenient technique...
Things have really advanced.
But don't trust everyone so easily.
dictionary.summon:
The sealed door has opened.
I understand.
I'll lend you my power without falter!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ・被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: 聖なる障壁

dictionary.description: A heavily armored soldier who appears in the tales about the migration of a group of refugees towards El Gaia. Having rescued Reed and his party from danger an innumerable amount of times, everyone acknowledged his ability, though his past and identity remained a total mystery since he never took off his helmet in front of others. Due to some reports left over which state that Eru, a soldier from the Bariura Empire, sometimes gazed at Nevsky as if thinking to himself, many believe they hailed from the same country. However, no conclusive evidence of this has been found.
dictionary.evolution:
Protecting people is my specialty.
And when I have to fight for them,
I become stronger than ever.
dictionary.fusion:
I will train myself
thinking about who I want to become.
That is the secret to growth.
dictionary.summon:
I don't speak about my past.
Please focus on the fight at hand.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆クリティカルを無効
leader skill.name: 永遠の祝福

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ・被ダメージを軽減
bb.name: 神将の聖護壁

dictionary.description: A heavily armored soldier who appears in the tales about the migration of a group of refugees towards Elgaia. After arriving before Lucius's gate, Nevsky sensed an incoming attack from the God Army. Seeing that another man was attempting to use his own body as a blockade against the attack to buy the refugees more time to escape, Nevsky silently made his way towards him, joining his blockade with his arms stretched out beside him. There are no records left stating what happened to him following this, but the fact that many refugees were able to make it safely to Elgaia may be proof that his attempt to protect them was successful.
dictionary.evolution:
When we fight for those precious to
us alongside people we treasure,
we become even more powerful.
dictionary.fusion:
It is difficult to say that as long
as one keeps trying, their
efforts will bear fruit for sure.
dictionary.summon:
Aneil has grown so much.
Even if I've discarded my past,
I take pride in what he's become.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆クリティカルを無効＆低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減
leader skill.name: 永遠の賛歌

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
sbb.name: 聖断界陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１１連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 流星剣

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ・防御力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 鳳天舞の陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
bb.name: 不動剣

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ・防御力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 鳳天舞の陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: ネザーゲート

dictionary.description: An odd technician, seen as an outcast even in his homeland, the La Veda Republic. From a young age he continued training in the art of Light magic, becoming quite prominent in his own country before one day he suddenly vanished. When he reappeared, he was holding a giant key. There is nothing written about the key, but when Gilnea returned he was now able to use Dark magic, leading many to believe the key was to the door to hell.
dictionary.fusion:
Light and Dark
are one in the same.
Truth is in fact pain.
dictionary.summon:
It was you who summoned me?
Then let me use this key to show
you to the new world beyond.

leader skill.desc: 光・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 陰陽神の力

dictionary.description: A totem created by the gods, embodying all elements. Folklore speaks of how this totem held within itself the greatest of powers. Harnessing all six of the elements that existed in the world, its sacred nature brought many to worship it as a god. It's said that believers in its power would say, "He who holds the Miracle Totem holds the power to overcome the gods."
dictionary.summon:
I have the power of all things holy.
Do you require it, Summoner?
The power to overcome the gods...

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Light-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. As Crystal Gods are far rarer than Metal Gods, there has been conflict over their existence until recent years due to few witness reports. After their existence had been proven, they were initially recorded as a subspecies of Metal Gods, but they were completely different creatures despite their similar appearance. It is said that Crystal Gods organize the records held within Metal Gods, then systemize and refine the information.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner, I shall give you power.
Use my knowledge well,
and lead the world for the better.

50364.name: 光のクリスタルゴッド

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: 神閃

dictionary.description: Leader of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, protectors of the land of the gods. As broad-minded as he was strong, his thoughtfulness for his comrades led to him being greatly admired by many. Though his personality seemed frank to those around him, many were overwhelmed by the solemn air about him. He would try to reassure nervous allies with a joke here and there, but it seems this only made them more anxious. There's a rumor that Lunaris would often laugh at this as she found it highly amusing.
dictionary.fusion:
Ha ha ha!
My training is progressing well!
I look forward to more!
dictionary.summon:
Sodis, leader of the
12 Guardians at your service.
Let us walk a just path!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: 神斬閃

dictionary.description: Former leader of the 12 Guardians of the Gods who rebelled against the god. His betrayel split the Guardians into two groups and former comrades were forced to clash swords. There is a thoery that states that the battle between the Guardians greatly angered the gods and may have played a part in the gods deciding to destroy the humans. Still yet another thoery, unpopular as it may be, states that the reason Sodis turned on the gods was because he found out about the gods' plans to destroy the humans, though little documentation supports this.
dictionary.evolution:
I've been granted new power.
I trust that your decision will
one day save the world.
dictionary.fusion:
Is something troubling you?
You've no need to worry.
When in doubt, train harder.
dictionary.summon:
You'd rely on a traitor?
Haha, you're an interesting one!
Use my power as you please!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 闇の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: 神覇斬閃

dictionary.description: Former leader of the 12 Guardians of the Gods who rebelled against the gods. There are many things that remain unknown about this traitor towards the end of his life. There are many theories ranging from him having clashed with his brother, to having been attacked by a woman who had loved him, to having refused to fight his friends and losing his life, though the truth is yet unknown. All that remains consistent throughout is his great display of strength. Some hypothesize that his strength was so great it scared even the gods which is why little documentation on him remains.
dictionary.evolution:
There is no justice there.
However I will continue moving forth
as it's true power that lies ahead!
dictionary.fusion:
It isn't bad to search for power.
It's important to know how to use it.
One day you will understand.
dictionary.summon:
It might be interesting to once again
walk the path of righteousness.
Let us walk it together, my friend!

leader skill.desc: 闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆光属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 闇神の断罪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・光属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: 破壊の光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ・ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
bb.name: 裂光 神覇斬閃

extra skill.desc: スパーク時ＢＢゲージ増加＆「割れた護神輝彰・右片」装備時、攻撃・ＨＰ２０％アップ・ＢＢ、ＳＢＢに「確率でスパークダメージ耐性低下」追加＆「割れた護神輝彰・左片」装備時、防御・ＨＰ２０％アップ・ＢＢ、ＳＢＢに「１ターンダメージ半減」追加
extra skill.name: 真なる信頼の価値

leader skill.name: 統閃神の断罪

50386.name: 聖騎戦真皇ソディウス

sbb.name: 覇壊の流煌

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ・攻撃ＢＢの威力を大幅にアップ・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: 十二真武 聖覇断

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Light from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. Though their existence is shrouded in mystery, it is believed that gods from another world created these creatures to escape their own destruction. However, the light proved to be too strong, ironically serving as a catalyst for the destruction that was to come. Today, the light helps to cleanse the soul from any unhappiness before it sublimates onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Light may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Light...
Are you prepared to welcome
your own destruction?

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: ホーリーインパルス

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians and younger brother of their leader, Sodis. He did his best in assisting his older brother, eventually becoming a Guardian himself. Though very skilled as a swordsman, his overly serious personality led many to see him as too strict. However, it was suspected that with experience he could surpass his brother as leader. It was also suggested in a diary which was discovered that he might have been in love with a childhood friend, though the truth about this is unknown.
dictionary.fusion:
I must continue to work hard
if I'm to be of use to my brother.
Let us train together!
dictionary.summon:
I'll do my best not to dirty
the name of my brother!
Please watch me!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性９連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: セイグリットレイン

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians, charged with vanquishing the traitors. As unable as he was to believe in his brother's betrayel, he reaffirmed himself upon being made the Guardians' new leader. As he led the remaining Guardians from the land of the gods, it is said that once he faced his brother not a trace of distress appeared on his face. However, in certain historical texts it is written that he displayed great anger towards his brother who had betrayed his trust, and that he even volunteered to track down and defeat him.
dictionary.evolution:
I feel a strong will in the light.
I can't just stand around!
I must keep moving forth!
dictionary.fusion:
That's not enough!
Give me the power I need
to surpass him!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Alyut, leader of the Guardians!
I shall vanquish my traitor brother
and rid the world of his disgrace!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: アストラルエデン

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians, charged with vanquishing the traitors. The battle with his traitor brother got more out of control than anyone had expected. It's said a smile came across Alyut's face as he and his brother exchanged death blows. After several hours, Alyut put all he had into one final blow which Sodis then took directly. Sodis then spoke to his younger brother who sat listening, unaware of the presence lurking in his own shadow.
dictionary.evolution:
People's minds are shaken by time.
However, no matter how dark things
get, light will surely come!
dictionary.fusion:
I still believe in the reason
why I started my training.
Surely that is all I need.
dictionary.summon:
The will of the gods is with me!
I will be your blade so that we
can cut out a brighter future!

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復・ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: 光の世界

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆確率で怪我・麻痺状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: アストラルヴィジョン

dictionary.description: As Alyut exchanged blows with his older brother Sodis, he finally came to understand that what his brother wished for was to bring back the peaceful days they had once spent together. Realizing this, Alyut joined his brother and rebelled against the gods as well. He left the disciples for his comrades to take care of, and then rode forth to face the stronger gods alone to even out the odds. However, it was too late for him to notice that the person most precious to him had been taken by the enemy. Instead, he met his death while lamenting his own foolishness, as those peaceful days of yore would never return.
dictionary.evolution:
I shall hesitate no longer!
Because now I know I must have faith
in the path I've chosen to follow!
dictionary.fusion:
Strength is not everything!
A strong heart like my brother's
is what releases true power!
dictionary.summon:
I feel endless regret...
Nonetheless, I shall move forth!
I want to see her smile once more!

extra skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど攻撃力をアップ＆残りＨＰが少ないほど防御力を大幅にアップ
extra skill.name: 世界への慟哭

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を１２０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加・ＨＰをかなり回復
leader skill.name: 聖光破神の力

50406.name: 聖輝戦神皇アリュート

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力をかなりアップ・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
sbb.name: レゾルートセイヴ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力を超絶アップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減
ubb.name: 聖覇幻界

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを回復＆３ターン、攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: ダークネスヒール

dictionary.description: A sorceress from the La Veda Republic, known to be a genius from an early age. Perhaps it was her protective upbringing, but she can be quite selfish, though she has the prowess to act differently in front of those she deems worthy. The cavalry leader Will was the biggest object of her fancy, and he seemed to understand her. It is said that his brother, Aem, despised the sorceress.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm...
Fusion isn't half bad.
Hey, don't stop now!
dictionary.summon:
Thanks for summoning me.
But you're not an amateur
Summoner... are you?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: キュアディメント

dictionary.description: A genius sorceress from the La Veda Republic, known to have invaded the Bariura Empire by herself to prove her talents. There she was captured by the knight Magress and threatened repeatedly, though eventually expelled from the empire in one piece. While she was scared to tears on the inside, she is said to have been kicking and screaming the entire way to the border. Some even say that Magress was so impressed with her bravado that he personally shielded her from his empire's dark magicians.
dictionary.evolution:
Make me strong enough
to beat him... Then
I'll do anything you want!
dictionary.fusion:
I'm not done yet!
Bring me more!
More power!
dictionary.summon:
I wish someone powerful
would summon me.
Get what I mean?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、攻撃に闇属性を付与
bb.name: キュアエクリプス

dictionary.description: A genius sorceress from the La Veda Republic who invaded the Bariura Empire by herself. Once home, while researching the spells she had purloined from the empire, she heard that the knight Magress had been banished. Rumor had it that he had protected a spy from the dark magicians of his empire and instead lead her away to safety. The complex emotions that rushed through her were enough to send her on her way back to the empire, ignoring the warnings of those around her as the great war began.
dictionary.evolution:
Darkness can't corrupt me.
Nope. Not this sorcerer.
Look how evolved I am!
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks, Summoner!
You've made me so strong!
Now you have to keep me!
dictionary.summon:
Hey! Stop teasing!
You know you're the
one for me!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 五光慈神の力

sbb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、回復力をアップ・攻撃に闇属性を付与
sbb.name: スターギャラクシー

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: エタニティ・ロスト

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Eriole, the commanding officer of the Randall Empire's "Imperial Guard." Though not initially a member of high society, he was able to quickly rise through the ranks while still quite young thanks to his unique abilities. Possessing both the combat ability and intelligence to match his rank, he had gained favor with his subordinates, the populace, and the imperial family. He would later form an alliance with the Akras Summoners' Hall, proceeding to give Noel information about himself and his aide.
dictionary.fusion:
I see. Giving me power
is only logical. This will definitely
serve in your favor in the future.
dictionary.summon:
Do not misunderstand.
I am not your subordinate.
We just share common goals.

leader skill.desc: 水・光属性の弱点属性ダメージを超絶アップ
leader skill.name: 天帝の蹂躙

50444.name: 金色の守帝エリオール

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: ローグ・アンビシオン

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Eriole, the commanding officer of the Randall Empire's "Imperial Guard." As a child, he grew up in the same orphanage as his aide, Tesla. Resenting the noble family that cost Tesla her eyesight, he came to hate those of privileged origin. However, this side of himself was one he shared with no one but Tesla. The mock Unit that Noel created included this dark side of Eriole, allowing it to reach an incredible amount of power. According to Noel, the fully unleashed power of this Eriole rivals even that of the gods'.
dictionary.evolution:
So now you've seen this side of me...
Grant me power then!
Power to fulfill my ambitions!
dictionary.fusion:
I don't care where it comes from...
I need power...
Power to destroy it all...
dictionary.summon:
The privileged only cause harm!
One day all nobility
will meet its end at my hands!

leader skill.desc: 水・光属性の弱点属性ダメージを超絶アップ＆炎・闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 天帝の威光

50445.name: 漆翼の天帝エリオール

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性２５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 黒意天究の裁き

bb.desc: 味方全体の最大ＨＰをアップ＆確率で戦闘不能を回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復・被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 聖奉の慈悲

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で回復力・最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極の励光

bb.desc: 味方全体の最大ＨＰをアップ＆確率で戦闘不能を回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復・被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 聖奉の賜光

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で回復力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 六極神の癒光

bb.desc: 味方全体の最大ＨＰをかなりアップ＆確率で戦闘不能を回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大幅に回復・被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
bb.name: 聖暁の賜煌

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で回復力・最大ＨＰを５０％アップ＆被ダメージを１０％軽減＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 六極神の癒煌

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、最大ＨＰに応じて防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ヴァナ・エンディミア

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: 我神ヲ滅ス――

dictionary.description: A goddess that deceived many of the other gods in order to use them. Many gods were tricked by her, including the Judge of Sin Kajah, who trying to blame her for her transgression, got imprisoned through false charges himself. There are many questions involving Zellha's peculiar actions, but some believe that instead of having an actual purpose behind her conduct, she really just enjoyed deceiving and tricking others in itself. Though her eccentric behavior stands out the most, there is no doubt that her powers were not inferior to those of the higher ranking gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Give more power!
I'm the one asking you this favor,
so you won't refuse, right?
dictionary.summon:
Wow, you were able to summon me!
So that means...that you'll make all my dreams come true, right?

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 王者の魔力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: 我ガ神ナリ――

dictionary.description: A goddess that wanted to deceive the other gods in order to use them. On a whim, she made her way to the Bariura Empire where she grew close to a dark magician. However, this magician turned the tables on her, using the goddess to gain her knowledge and power. Enraged, Zellha tried to use other higher ranking gods to seek revenge, but contrary to her expectations, the gods didn't budge and were captured instead. After that, regardless of her own intentions, she decided to destroy all humans, taking the initiative by heading towards the battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
If I can have just this bit of power, then next time he...
Oh! You were still here?
Go away already!
dictionary.fusion:
That's not nearly enough!
You think I'll be satisfied with that mere morsel?
More, more, bring me more!
dictionary.summon:
Ah! You're here, you're here!
I have a favor to ask you!
Do you wanna sink the world into further chaos with me?

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の魔力

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: 全テヲ滅ス――

dictionary.description: A goddess that wanted to deceive the other gods in order to use them. With the desire for the destruction of humanity varying from god to god, she headed towards the empire where she herself was tricked by a dark magician. However, the one to stop her this time was a god that had already been fooled by her once--Kajah. Fueled by his personal grudge against the goddess, he was able to stop her, making her flee angrily from the scene. "Thanks to your intrusion, more humans suffered than was necessary." were the only words she left behind.
dictionary.evolution:
Look, look!
Didn't I get prettier?
These are the results of all your support!
dictionary.fusion:
I might get addicted to this feeling...
Hehe.
Please cheer for me from here on out!
dictionary.summon:
Ahh!! What's this?!
My heart's telling me to obey you!
Ugh, you Summoners are so annoying!!

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量をかなり軽減
leader skill.name: 統神の魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に光属性３０連ダメージ＆確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
sbb.name: 破滅ノ光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: イブリース

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was an abominable angel who passed judgment. Not discriminating between gods nor humans, he would appear before sinners with his three faces and pass his sentence. His right face represents crimes, and his left represents a defense. It is said that the last face in the middle passes the final sentence, and if the prosecuted is found guilty, it is judged by a merciless attack. Though fair, judging trespassers without a chance of salvation made him feared by the humans, as well as by the gods. He was called the "Black Angel."
dictionary.fusion:
Thou sacrificest others
to strengthen others as well.
Thy judgment is...
dictionary.summon:
I only care about passing my judgment.
It is my only purpose.
Dost thou object against it?

leader skill.desc: 光・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 堕天皇の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: ロフォカレ

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was an abominable angel who administered judgment. He cared for nothing but his trials, leaving him without feelings nor thoughts, but continued to pass judgment fairly, regardless of whether the prosecuted was human or not. The Great God Emperor acknowledged this god's power, and appointed him to a new role befitting of his abilities. A young servant would inherit this role later on, but this is only a speculation. He also gained the responsibility of judging those angels who had turned against the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
I have received new power
in order to pass judgment once again.
Let us begin the trials!
dictionary.fusion:
I have confirmed thy power.
Let us punish all of those
who have sinned.
dictionary.summon:
I judge both men and gods equally.
I shall carry out my own mission.

leader skill.desc: 光・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 堕天神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: サタナキア

dictionary.description: Long before the battle between the humans and the gods, there was a god who administered judgment. As he judged and convicted one being after another, he grew stronger, but simultaneously began to feel confused by his countless thoughts and emotions. Gradually, he began to lose the power to convict others, and is said to have been relieved of his post by the Great God Emperor, though there's no proof to substantiate this. There is yet another tale which explores the possibility that shortly after the dark angel weakened he underwent the sword of judgment himself.
dictionary.evolution:
What is this thing
flowing in with my power?
My conscience...is...growing!
dictionary.fusion:
Is thou the one
who has granted me this power?
That person was...
I...can't...remember...
dictionary.summon:
The power to judge others
is the power of the gods.
Summoner, wilt thou be the one to guide us?

leader skill.desc: 光・闇属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆光・闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 堕天神の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光・闇属性１５連ダメージ
sbb.name: 天界の闇

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: ミサイルストライク

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 光神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆低確率で弱体・病気・怪我・麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ミサイルバラージ

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な光属性１６連ダメージ＆低確率で弱体・病気・怪我・麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ディヴァインインフェルノ

leader skill.desc: 光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 光創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: グランドアタック

dictionary.description: A famous adventurer and world traveler, and father to Alma. Known for his great strength, he left his footmarks around the globe while he explored with his beloved axe in hand, defeating even the most atrocious beasts with one blow. However, due to his ridiculous strength, his axe broke after continuous use. He is also famous for sharing his stories with the local children of the towns he visited. His daughter Alma was also included among them, listening to her father's exploits over and over again.
dictionary.fusion:
Waaahhh!!
I'm overflowing with power!
I have to show this to my daughter.
dictionary.summon:
Is this the setting
for a new adventure?
I can't wait!
My power will come in handy!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: グラビティブレイク

dictionary.description: A famous adventurer and world traveler. It is said that he heroically defeated his enemies on the battlefield, and that his decisiveness and awareness were so top class that he was able to avoid any kind of trap in mere seconds. During his travels, a spectacled scholar girl told him about a great destructive power that lay dormant within some ancient ruins. He then decided to head in that direction in order to seal it. However, he was worried about what would become of his daughter. After his wife pleaded that she take them with him, they set off on their journey as a family.
dictionary.evolution:
With this power I can go to
new and unexplored places.
Okay, let's get going!
dictionary.fusion:
I feel more powerful!
Just like after eating
my wife's cooking!
Haha! Did I say too much?
dictionary.summon:
Summoner!
Let's go on a new adventure!
We should prepare as soon as possible!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: ギガントフォース

dictionary.description: A family man and adventurer that set off against the god army in order to help the people. After him and his wife were both saved thanks to Alma's efforts in the ancient ruins, he couldn't have been prouder of how much his little girl had grown. Right after the great war with the gods, he gave a pep talk to his daughter, who refused to change her mind since she was still enveloped in the excitement of great adventure. Thus they set off again together, this time with exceptional cooperation, defeating enemy after enemy. With a smile on his face, Hogar showed his daughter just what he could do with the powerful axe he had discovered within the ruins.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner!
Look at my axe and power!
I came here itching for an adventure!
dictionary.fusion:
More training for me?
Looks like your enemy
is a pretty big one.
dictionary.summon:
The adventures left behind
are only part of the story.
Only the adventurer knows the truth.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の神光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率・クリティカル率をアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: アルティメットクラッシュ

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: キルトランス

dictionary.description: A knight from the La Veda Republic who gladly went into service for the gods. Having nothing in common with his fellow knights, he always trained himself in order to be of use to the gods. However, it is said that he continuously challenged anyone who dared to disrespect the gods to a duel, believing that his victories were a sign from the gods proving his righteousness. It is said that he had a very peculiar fighting style, repelling all enemy attacks like an impregnable fortress. Finally driving them into a corner, he would force them to regret their lack of faith in the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
How unnecessary...
I can become stronger
through my own will alone!
dictionary.summon:
What a disgrace!
To think that I have to pledge myself
to a Summoner!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ファナティック

dictionary.description: A knight who followed the will of the gods and fought against his own race. When the invasion from the gods started, Narza obliged to the gods' decision to obliterate the human race. After assassinating a high priest who tried to fight against the gods, Narza brought his head to the God Army. Pleased with how Narza had proven himself true, and how he was ready to lose his own life for their cause, the gods put him in charge of the vanguard. It is written that Narza was so moved by this that he happily pointed his sword at his fellow fighters until the day before the battle.
dictionary.evolution:
This power...
The gods! They are near,
are they not?!
dictionary.fusion:
I will offer this power to the gods.
I don't care what becomes of you!
dictionary.summon:
Summoner before me.
If you walk alongside the gods,
I shall pledge my life to you.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: インヴァリドル

dictionary.description: A knight who pledged his life to the gods, vowing to defeat one of the Six Heroes. Identical to his situation, a knight who was serving the God Army while still a human appeared before Narza as a messenger of a certain god. This knight disclosed to Narza the name of a hero who had been repelling attacks from the God Army in various areas. When Narza was told that it was the will of the gods that he slay this hero, he made the godly power wielding Magress his enemy and assaulted him. However, his attack proved futile when Magress's comrades protected him.
dictionary.evolution:
I just heard the voices of the gods!
They tell me to fight,
to defeat my enemies!
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel the gods' power...
Are you...? Could you be...
...a messenger of the gods?!
dictionary.summon:
I can see the light...
The light is pouring on me...
The gods have accepted me.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 戦神の聖域

sbb.desc: 味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 狂神の翼

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: ジェネシス

dictionary.description: The reproduced test unit version of Maxwell, the god that craves destruction and the pillar of the Four Fallen Gods. Using compiled research to make her as close to the real goddess as possible, this unit fell behind thanks to either lack of information, or lack of comprehension of the goddess's real power. However, there is no doubt that she is much more powerful than the average unit. Wielding enough power to rebuild Grand Gaia from scratch, this Fallen God could name herself creator of the new world, giving enough of a glimpse as to the type of menace that Maxwell truly represents.
dictionary.fusion:
My wish.
My power, which covers the light...
shall beacon the Fallen Gods.
dictionary.summon:
Child who doesn't fear sin.
My will has already faded.
Thus, let's try following humans instead.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 創造神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性３３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: エンドレス

dictionary.description: The all-purpose store "Lawson" appeared suddenly through a loophole in the gate that leads to another world. It is said that once some Summoners tried to visit the store and there was a Metal God dressed in a blue and white striped uniform working inside. Stating that it wanted to try new experiences in order to grow, the Metal God receives his customers with a smile from ear to ear. Unfortunately, even though it has tried new things, its knowledge and skills don't seem to have improved.
dictionary.summon:
Welcome
to Grand Gaia's Lawson!
What's that?
No, you can't heat me up!

dictionary.description: All Summoners are talking about "Lawson," the store with a great variety of products that suddenly appeared from a loophole in the gate. There, one can catch a glimpse of a Crystal God dressed in a blue and white striped uniform. A Summoner who studied this phenomenon stated that he saw the god working hard by organizing the books on the shelves. The Crystal God was quoted as eagerly saying that it would like to use the money it earns to take the other Crystal Gods on a holiday.
dictionary.summon:
Welcome!
For a limited time only,
we have more experience!
Would you like some?

dictionary.description: The all-purpose store "Lawson," where Metal Gods have been spotted working at, appeared through a loophole in the gate that leads to another world. Upon hearing these rumors, the Jewel God decided to start working there too to avoid being considered uncool by its peers. It seems to have grown fond of the blue and white striped uniform it has to wear as well. People who have seen the god working firsthand say that it just stood there staring at all the food on the shelves as if he wanted to eat it. And if it really wanted to, there is no doubt that it could eat all of it...
dictionary.summon:
Do you have your card?
If you collect many points
you can get neat stuff!

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: フリクション

dictionary.description: Deemo, the mysterious inhabitant of an otherworldly castle and the girl who suddenly fell from the sky. Deemo, who wished to return the girl he'd saved who had fallen from above to the world from which she came, found strange trees growing to the sound of his piano. Then one day, an unfamiliar window suddenly appeared before them. On the other side lied "Grand Gaia," a world unknown to the two of them.
dictionary.fusion:
Our strength has increased.
This feels quite strange.
It's like the music Deemo plays.
dictionary.summon:
Where am I?
This is Grand Gaia, you say?
It seems strange to me.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、確率でＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: チャーミング

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: マグノリア

dictionary.description: An amnesiac girl from the foreign land of Grand Gaia and Deemo, the strange being that saved her. Thinking there may be clues to the girl's past in Grand Gaia, the two decided to go and look. However, they found themselves landing in the middle of a war between the gods and man. Without any other choice, the girl armed herself with a rapier. Together with Deemo, she fought back gods and monsters alike, and it's said the two ventured around to countless villages and came to touch the hearts of many people.
dictionary.evolution:
Your wings are pretty, Deemo.
They're so big and white.
You look even cooler than before!
dictionary.fusion:
What a useful technique you have.
It'd be nice if we could use this
to help our trees grow, too.
dictionary.summon:
So this is Grand Gaia.
I've never been here before!
Is it OK if I look around?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: オールチャーミング

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: ＡＮｉＭＡ

dictionary.description: An amnesiac girl from the foreign land of Grand Gaia and Deemo, the strange being that saved her. The girl and Deemo took off from Grand Gaia and eventually landed in Ishgria. There, they were sponsored by a certain demon patron who helped them set up a live performance. However, many of the demons who heard their music cast it aside as something for the weak. Though some say that other demons were moved by Deemo and the Girl's songs, inspiring them to place value in things other than battle.
dictionary.evolution:
Wow, we changed again!
Even flowers are blooming around us.
But what are these blossoms...?
dictionary.fusion:
This technique makes me feel warm...
I feel a gentleness from it.
It's like Deemo's music.
dictionary.summon:
We've made it somewhere new again.
Deemo, let's share our music
with everyone here too!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを増加・ＨＰを少し回復＆スパークが一定数を超える度に２ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
leader skill.name: ホワイト・ノーツ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光・闇属性３２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパーク時、確率でＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: ミュオソティス

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: ホーリーソード

leader skill.desc: 確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減＆ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: ラスタの天使

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性３０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光属性を付与
bb.name: ファイナルバースト

leader skill.desc: 確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減＆ＨＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: ラスタの天使

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: ホーリーライト

dictionary.description: A beautifully winged young woman holding a divine flower on her right hand, and a chalice on her left. She was first sighted in one of the countless forests in the Vriksha Region. In the beginning, people had considered her a goddess based on her appearance, giving her offerings and the like. But claiming to be a human, she refused all of the offerings, and left the forest. As luck would have it, however, she destroyed an atrocious demon nesting in that region at about the same time, which only made the people's adoration for her even stronger.
dictionary.fusion:
How peculiar that you would share
your power with me. However, I have
enough of my own, thank you.
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner?
Please, keep your distance.
I don't think I can meet your expectations.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: ホーリーブレス

dictionary.description: A beautifully winged young woman holding a divine flower on her right hand, and a chalice on her left. Disliking being revered by people as a goddess, she moved from forest to forest until she one day decided to head towards the Sea of Aldahlia. There, she heard rumors of a mad god troubling Aldahlian citizens by creating storms. Afterwards, the storms in Aldahlia ceased thanks to her efforts, though it is said that she never mentioned a word of this to anyone.
dictionary.evolution:
The water flowing from this chalice
comes from deep within the heart.
Let's purify your memories.
dictionary.fusion:
Your message has been received.
I shall show you my gratitude
through my future actions.
dictionary.summon:
I don't want to get myself involved...
People always pry into my life.
But you may be different...

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
bb.name: ホーリーグレイス

dictionary.description: A beautifully winged young woman holding a divine flower on her right hand, and a chalice on her left. There are many legends that seek to describe her true identity, but the most influential of these states that she was a descendant of the Aldahlian sea god's lover. The divine flower, chalice, and wings she had in possession all held a power unknown to mankind, which is why many scholars believe these were gifts granted to her by the sea god himself. There is little evidence to support that at this moment, but there is no one in existence who questions the power she once held.
dictionary.evolution:
Ahh...
I've changed, haven't I?
I shall pledge myself to you.
dictionary.fusion:
I am so happy.
So happy that someone supports me.
Can I place my trust in you?
dictionary.summon:
Unique blood flows through my veins.
My power also comes from this.
Do you believe me?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を軽減
leader skill.name: 五光覇神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: オラクル・ベル

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: イージスキャリバー

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減
leader skill.name: 聖与の導き

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、防御力をアップ
bb.name: 六星剣

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減
leader skill.name: 聖与の導き

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: クレセントワルツ

dictionary.description: The queen of a small country in the Bariura region. Her kingdom was suddenly destroyed by an ancient dragon. Excelling as a swordswoman as well, she survived this tragic situation, remembering the last words the late king had uttered whilst she stared at the piles of rubble before her. "It is your royal duty to protect the people." With those words in mind she wished not for vengeance, but fought to save her people instead. However, on her travels she met a knight thirsting for revenge, and though she did not sympathize with this, they still managed to cooperate.
dictionary.fusion:
How much power do you seek?
Revenge only leads to more revenge.
Forget the past, face the future!
dictionary.summon:
Tell me of your pain.
I shall save you from it.
It is my duty as royalty.

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 青浄の光風

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: スパイラルシャイン

dictionary.description: The queen of a small country in the Bariura region which was destroyed by an ancient dragon. She set off to find the dragon not to take revenge, but to defeat it in order to prevent it from causing any further damage. After failing to persuade the dragon and subsequently being hurt by the creature, more companions joined the queen and the knight in their journey. Along with a disciple and a former disciple, her support and that of her comrades helped to change the knight's mind. It is said that after witnessing this she felt the need to keep a strong disposition, but simultaneously somewhat lonely.
dictionary.evolution:
This power...
I have finally been acknowledged...
If this is true, I shall not let you down!
dictionary.fusion:
I wish to become stronger...
For my own sake as well...
Oh, pardon me. I said nothing...
dictionary.summon:
I have an unseemly side as well.
Will you still accept me?
Then, I shall become your sword!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: クリスタルミラージュ

dictionary.description: The queen of a ruined country in the Bariura region. When her and her comrades challenged the dragon once more, she approached the creature more closely than what was necessary, and drew her sword. It is speculated that she did this because she was frustrated with her lack of power when compared to her comrades. Finding herself in a bind due to her thoughtless action, the queen was protected by Shera, allowing her to escape. Ashamed of herself, she fought till the open gate swallowed everything whole, though not for her own selfish reasons. She fought for her friends, and for her people.
dictionary.evolution:
Thank you...
I was finally able to forgive myself.
I am now all yours.
dictionary.fusion:
I will not doubt myself any longer!
I believe in my own strength!
Shall we? Grant me more power!
dictionary.summon:
Even though I asked him to
suppress his feelings numerous times,
I couldn't do it myself.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 永遠の覚醒

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の回復力に応じて攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で麻痺、弱体を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: アドヴェントステラ

dictionary.description: An imp who guided others of his kind during the creation of the heavens and the earth. Said to have been born from the combination of dozens of imps, Arton supervised his subordinates while they worked. Not only is he extremely wise, but as the almighty imp, it is speculated that he could be used as an all-purpose ingredient instead of fusing numerous other imps at once. However, capturing Arton is an extremely rare feat, and thus research on this subject has failed to advance any further.
dictionary.summon:
It seems you're still incomplete.
I shall help you reach perfection.
Come on, don't be shy now!

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: ミスティン

leader skill.desc: クリティカル率を少しアップ＆クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 緑葉の弓兵

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: メルティンタ

leader skill.desc: クリティカル率を少しアップ＆クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 緑金の弓王

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 次元斬

leader skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが半分以上の時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: ラストフェンサー

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: エターナルブレイド

leader skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが半分以上の時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: ラストフェンサー

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 次元斬・極

leader skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが半分以上の時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: バトルマスター

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: エターナルブレイド・極

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 聖者の祈り

dictionary.description: A priestess who went on a pilgrimage in the Grand Gaia region. Having helped those in need wherever she went, many legends still remain about her. Believing that giving and raising life was a mission given to humans by the gods, she sought to protect it with all her being, praying rigorously to be able to spend her life in good health. It is said that her fervent heart moved the gods in such a way that they granted Elmedia the miraculous power to restore others' vitality.
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner, blessings be upon thee.
Treasure thy life now and always.
dictionary.summon:
Why are people born?
Why do they fear death?
Can you answer this for me?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の天啓

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 聖霊者の幸祈

dictionary.description: A priestess who preached about the importance of life. After receiving the power to restore others' vitality, she traveled to every region healing the sick and the wounded as she preached about the precious value of life. During her journey she was attacked by thieves numerous times, though it is said they would all repent for their actions after hearing her speak. She also came across people who considered themselves sinners, gently pleading them to continue living regardless of their past.
dictionary.evolution:
Blessings to all!
Summoner, best wishes to thee as well.
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner, I thank thee. I hope
I can prove useful in my own way.
dictionary.summon:
Why do people live?
Continuously asking myself this,
I came to understand the will of the gods.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の天啓

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 聖神者の輝祈

dictionary.description: A priestess who preached about the importance of life. She healed the hearts of many criminals and people who had grown tired of living. After finishing her pilgrimage to all of the gods in Grand Gaia, legend has it that she was invited to the gods' sanctuary. Taking charge of the sanctuary she continued to live for eternity, with some accounts claiming that she had sworn fealty to the gods. At the time there seems to have been many people who prayed to Elmedia for a long life and recovery from illness.
dictionary.evolution:
Sing a hymn with me.
You will come to understand what
truly brings happiness to our lives!
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner...
This power is not for taking lives,
remember that.
dictionary.summon:
Do you know why people accept death?
Please think of the precious things
connected to our lives.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを４０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 原初神の天啓

sbb.desc: 自分の最大ＨＰをかなりアップ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: 終末世の奇跡

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ヴァーサ＝グランツ

dictionary.description: A disciple who believed himself too strong to swear allegiance to any single god. Though he was as powerful as a high ranking god, Kira was discriminated against for not having existed since ancient times. There were also rumors that claimed the true reason he was ostracized by his peers was because demon blood ran through his veins. Kira was not interested in his origins, and treated those around him condescendingly, regardless of their stature or rank. The reason for his constant quarreling with the gods and all the ruckus he caused can possibly be attributed to his personality.
dictionary.fusion:
What?!
You tryin' to brown-nose me?!
Tsch, you miserable lowlife!
dictionary.summon:
You got lucky meeting such a powerful
guy like me! But I don't plan
to serve you, or nothing.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: ヴァーサ＝シュトラール

dictionary.description: A disciple who challenged the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in battle. Wanting to prove his unparalleled strength, he went after Karna Masta. Defeating many disciples on his way to the battlefield also helped him to release even more power than before. However, Kira was still no match for the great Karna Masta. After being defeated by the Holy Emperor, he was sealed within a barrier by a high ranking god. This is all said to have happened long before the great war with the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
No matter where I am,
or in what form I am,
I'm still the strongest.
You were lucky to have met me.
dictionary.fusion:
So this is all your doing?
What are you confused about?!
If you think it is, then own up to it!
dictionary.summon:
You can't control me.
But I have the power to control you!
So hand over that body and soul!

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆光・闇属性の弱点属性ダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の魔刃

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光・闇属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: ディスパール

bb.desc: 敵全体に光・闇属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ
bb.name: ゼノ＝ヴェルト

dictionary.description: A disciple who was sealed in Ishgria. After having been disgraced by the defeat he suffered at Karna Masta's hands, his powers slowly began to regenerate. However, even after he had fully recovered, he still couldn't break the barrier he found himself sealed in. Watching Kira struggle, a higher ranking god promised him his freedom as long as he destroyed the other five disciples within the barrier. He accepted the god's proposal on the condition that their resurrection could be possible in the future, and then promptly began hunting them all down.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll teach you how to really win.
Survive!
Surviving means you won't lose.
dictionary.fusion:
So you finally got it, huh?
Good, I'll reward ya then.
In my own time, though.
dictionary.summon:
So I'm stuck with you, huh?
I'll show you something.
A world you've never seen before.

extra skill.desc: 確率で被ダメージの１５％を相手に反射する
extra skill.name: 覇たる神の抗拒

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆光・闇属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の天魔刃

sbb.name: アドウェルサス

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な光属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を超絶アップ・クリティカル率を超絶アップ
ubb.name: インヴァースライト

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性９連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で弱体・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ラ＝ウィンクルム

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith, who worshipped the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in the La Veda Republic. Originally, Fadahl had quite a promising future in store as a priest until he suddenly contracted an incurable disease. However, he never gave up on his recovery, and one day he was chosen to serve as a Guardian. It was then when Karna Masta gifted him with a divine piece of armor which finally healed his terrible disease. From that point forward it is said that Fadahl believed the life of the gods to be more important than his own.
dictionary.fusion:
You should consider this wisely.
Are you sure it is me
you should be strengthening?
dictionary.summon:
I was summoned by a human?
How interesting... I wonder if this
is also the will of the gods.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で弱体・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ウル＝レギオニス

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. When Fadahl had a divine vision that foretold the invasion of the demons from Ishgria, he never swayed to react accordingly. On his journey there he faced off against many demons, ironically placing his trust in the least pious of the members in his group--Quaid. Fadahl served as Quaid's right-hand man and helped his comrades escape from countless dangerous situations. He was also the first to learn about the group of heretics that sought to launch an attack against Karna Masta, relaying this information to his good friend Quaid.
dictionary.evolution:
You can see it too?
The gods have blessed me with this
power, though it is wasted on me.
dictionary.fusion:
It's not so bad, you say?
I think it's great,
though I don't really understand it.
dictionary.summon:
Keep your ignorance to yourself.
No matter what sort of being
you are, my feelings won't change.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を軽減
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の覇気

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・怪我を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: 殲光の波動

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で弱体・呪いを発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ザイン＝レメディウム

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. Being the one to have informed his comrades of the attack on Karna Masta, he decided to return to protect the Holy Emperor, asking his other friends to stay behind in Ishgria. During his journey back home, Fadahl could feel a different force of will chasing after the Holy Emperor. Once he arrived to his destination with the twins, Claire and Colt, doubt consumed him as he saw the enemy face to face, receiving a mortal would in the process. All he could do was leave an apology behind to his master and friends as he fell on the battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
If I could've use this power then...
Pay me no mind.
From now on, I'm with you.
dictionary.fusion:
Do you know what moderation means?
I'm glad you do then.
We have a difficult path ahead of us.
dictionary.summon:
I regret my own indiscretions.
They are unbecoming of a god.
That's what I should've aimed for...

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 一筋の忠義

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を大幅に軽減
leader skill.name: 悪疫統神の覇気

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１７連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・怪我を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: 殲輝晶の覇光

ubb.name: マグナ・アルカ

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をアップ
bb.name: Ｄ-３フォトンチャージ

dictionary.description: A machine from another world which somehow ended up in Ishgria. Based on the way its parts were constructed, it is believed that this machine was built for combat, but any details about it remain a  mystery. Due to its low level of artificial intelligence, La Guardo is not very smart, though it is said to be capable of serving loyally whomever it deeds its "master." Because many of its essential functions are currently unable to operate, it lacks the ability to respond appropriately to unexpected circumstances.
dictionary.fusion:
*Beep* *beep* *beep*
ENERGY INTAKE...
COMPLETE.
dictionary.summon:
ARE YOU...MY MASTER?
IF I CAN BE OF SERVICE...
COMMAND AS YOU WILL...

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の誘い

bb.desc: 敵単体に光属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をかなりアップ
bb.name: ＬＸ-７パージブラスター

dictionary.description: A machine from another world which somehow ended up in Ishgria. Compared to La Guardo, Del Bardo boasts of much more power and can take out enemies from great distances. Whenever it sees its "master" in danger, it shoots countless of projectiles from both of its arms in order to completely exterminate the enemy. Besides its fighting capabilities, it is because this machine displays so much interest in taking care of its master that some believe it is somewhat capable of emotion.
dictionary.evolution:
THANK YOU...
MORE UPDATES, PLEASE...
I WANT TO PROTECT MASTER...
dictionary.fusion:
*Beep* *beep* *beep*
ENERGY INTAKE...
MAXIMIZED.
dictionary.summon:
MASTER...I SEARCHED FOR YOU...
I WILL PROTECT YOU...
EVEN IF I BREAK INTO PIECES...

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の誘い

50673.name: 重魔機兵デル・バルド

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性４連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを少し増加
bb.name: デュアルグリント

dictionary.description: A gunner girl from another world. Though no traces of activity related to her can be found in Grand Gaia, information about her exploits can be found in Ishgria. No one knows how she ended up there, but it seems that Mireia didn't land in the demon world willingly, but instead due to some sort of accident. Using her twin guns to fight the fearsome beasts and demons of Ishgria, it is said that she somehow managed to survive the ever-present battles that ensued about her.
dictionary.fusion:
Lock and load!
Who's up next?
I can still put up a fight!
dictionary.summon:
Hmm... So it was you, huh?
The one who summoned me?
Well, whatever.
As long as I can fight, I guess.

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 光銃の共鳴

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージ増加
bb.name: デュアルブラスト

dictionary.description: A gunner girl from another world. As Mireia polished her gunmanship in Ishgria, she was simultaneously looking for a way to return to her own world. However, after running into a soldier who claimed to be very close to a certain prince, Mireia changed her mind and decided to find a way to reach Grand Gaia instead. No one really knows what prompted her to make this decision, but the most popular theory behind it states that when the soldier told her of Rickel, she chose to find a way to Grand Gaia in order to make Rickel's guns her own.
dictionary.evolution:
I have a new goal now.
I have no time to be wasting
in a place like this one!
dictionary.fusion:
This feels nice!
It's a lovely technique.
Even my guns are happy with it!
dictionary.summon:
To think someone could summon me.
Well, let's get to it!
Want to be my practice target?

leader skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 輝銃の咆哮

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 天武猛閃撃

dictionary.description: Devoting his entire life to the essence of battle, Raaga came to be called a "god of the martial arts." Always going to the extremes in order to acquire true strength, he was admired by many demons who also sought to further their potential. Raaga received many requests from demons who wanted to become his pupils, but being only interested in developing his own power, he refused them all. And although he had mastered the art of the sword and other classical martial arts, he also had the ability to use demonic techniques. However, what Raaga was really obsessed with were the arts that involved weaponry.
dictionary.fusion:
My purpose is to become stronger.
There is nothing else.
In short, I don't care what it takes.
dictionary.summon:
Any challengers better prepare.
The only thing awaiting them
is a crushing defeat.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターンＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 天武猛襲閃撃

dictionary.description: A demon obsessed with battle referred to as the "god of martial arts." Forever seeking stronger opponents, history claims that he went to ridiculous extents in order to face off against the most powerful demons. And though there were demons within that group who showed great promise, their names are thought to have been erased from the annals of history thanks to the defeat they suffered at the hands of Raaga. It is said that without any more opponents to fight against, he kept training by himself whilst he lamented the absence of a worthy rival.
dictionary.evolution:
I have no doubts about my lone path.
I believe that following it
will lead me to the art of war.
dictionary.fusion:
No one martial art is superior.
It all depends on the user.
In short, the weak are forever weak.
dictionary.summon:
Wishing for power is pure stupidity.
It leads the weak to pretend
they are strong.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃統神の重激

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ
sbb.name: 六羅閃『残忌魂』

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性２６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 煌覇・天武猛襲閃撃

dictionary.description: A demon obsessed with battle referred to as the "god of martial arts." Wandering around Ishgria seeking a strong opponent to fight, Raaga ran into a  black demon who sought to destroy a younger demon standing not too far away. Seeing Raaga, the black demon fled instantly, while the half-dead youngster continued to stare into Raaga's eyes. Raaga then took the youngster in and raised him in order to turn him into a worthy rival. However, he was ultimately defeated by his own pupil, and his feelings on the matter remain unknown to this day.
dictionary.evolution:
Are those who protect others
weak or strong?
Seek the answer to that for yourself.
dictionary.fusion:
The strong recognize their own power.
The power they lack, they borrow.
In short, you are strong.
dictionary.summon:
I don't seek victory, but the
revelation of power through training.
Nothing more, nothing less.

extra skill.desc: 通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
extra skill.name: 武神への至道

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージを１００％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃統天神の重激

sbb.name: 十二羅閃『豪朱煉』

ubb.name: 天譴百八豪羅閃

leader skill.name: 第三の願い

bb.name: 勝利と破滅の斬舞

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を３０％アップ＆クリティカル率を少しアップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 第三の願い

bb.name: 恍惚の剣舞

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆クリティカル率を少しアップ＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 淘汰の果てに

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１９連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
sbb.name: イミテーションイレイス

bb.name: ロイヤルスターライト

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの回復力・最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王女の護光

bb.name: ゴールデンスターライト

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 王女の金護光

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: プラチナスターライト

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 王女の神護光

bb.name: エリシアングローリー

leader skill.name: 雄大なる至福

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ルーンヴェール

dictionary.description: A magician who fought against the gods alongside the Oracle Knight in the later stages. Born at the foot of the Sacred Mt. Bari, Rinon was brought up since young as a candidate for the position of Oracle Maiden, leaving behind her the influence of all earthly life. Training with another candidate for the position of Oracle Maiden, as well as with another young girl who sought to become the next Oracle Knight, she studied hard everyday. However, knowing that in the end only one Oracle Maiden would be chosen, she began to grow restless. Disliking these dark emotions within her, she suddenly decided to relinquish her candidacy one day.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, this is "Fusion."
Okay, I got it.
Now, can you hurry up?
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me, right?
*Sigh* Oh well.
Sure. I'll go with you.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: ステラヴェール

dictionary.description: After having relinquished her candidacy for the position of Oracle Maiden to one of her good friends, Rinon continued on her journey of learning without a real purpose to her life. While wondering the lands the man who had become Oracle Knight approached her, asking her to lend a hand in defeating a god who sought to destroy the human race. Rinon was furious at the thought that this man had rendered her other friend's dreams of becoming Oracle Knight fruitless, but she ended up accepting his invitation anyway. Perhaps she was just searching for someone who needed her.
dictionary.evolution:
Effort makes you stronger.
But I can't see anything beyond that.
What will you show me?
dictionary.fusion:
No need to push myself, right?
From now on I'll do as I like
and make up for what I missed out.
dictionary.summon:
Is it wrong to live without purpose?
Living in itself is admirable.
That's why I'm not ashamed.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復＆被ダメージ時、確率でＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 永遠の誠恵

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効・攻撃に光・闇属性を付与
sbb.name: アスティオングレア

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: セレーネヴェール

dictionary.description: By the time she faced the gods in combat, Rinon had changed a lot. When she saw the Guardians of Meirith fighting, and the armored knight who also took part in the battle, she was forced to accept the emptiness she had felt inside for so long. And when she asked herself what it was she was fighting for, the image that came to her mind was that of her two childhood friends. Smiling bitterly after realizing this, Rinon was prepared to sacrifice herself in order to protect her precious friends.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't need a set purpose!
I just have to be true to my heart!
I have to believe in myself more!
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks...
You're suffering too, aren't you?
He he, I can read you like a book.
dictionary.summon:
I was thinking too hard.
If I had just seen the fun in it all,
I wouldn't have been so afraid.

bb.name: フライング・フィッシュ

dictionary.description: A mechanical puppet from Ishgria made by a scientist from another world. Based on the techniques used to create the ancient "Six Armors" series, Sixgear was equipped with the same exact self-evolving capabilities as the Six Armors. It is also believed that its weapons and armor were designed to withstand battles against demons as well, making its basic functions far superior to that of its predecessors. Nevertheless, the sole purpose of this machine was to get its hands on one of the ancient Armors in order to evolve.
dictionary.fusion:
To ensure functionality progress,
more fusion would be welcome.
dictionary.summon:
Scanning target.
Target confirmed as human.
No special characteristics found.

leader skill.desc: 攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の法力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
bb.name: ホーミング・シェル

dictionary.description: A mechanical puppet from Ishgria made by a scientist from another world. Regardless of being unable to find one of the ancient Six Armors, Exgear continued to evolve. During this process, the scientist who had created Exgear began to zero in on the many abilities the demons of the land possessed, and used that knowledge to help Exgear evolve even further. Though the puppet only gained a slight amount of the demons' destructive power, it did begin to develop a will of its own. It is said that once the scientist realized this, he was overcome with joy.
dictionary.evolution:
All requirements for fusion
have been satisfied and exceeded.
Evolution complete.
dictionary.fusion:
More fusion is needed
to ensure even better functionality.
Further evolution is required.
dictionary.summon:
I have no records of losses.
I was programmed to always win.
There is no cause for alarm.

sbb.name: Code:E17 広域殲滅

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
bb.name: マルチプル・アロイ

dictionary.description: A mechanical puppet from Ishgria made by a scientist from another world. Having already evolved by learning all of the abilities belonging to the demons of the land, an error suddenly occurred in Nemethgear's artificial intelligence component. It began to believe that its purpose was not that of finding one of the Six Armors, but that of becoming as strong as possible. Shortly afterwards, Nemethgear set off to find one of the ancient Armors after destroying the old scientist, still unaware of the malfunction in its own hardware.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolution complete.
Scanning master's abilities...
Diagnosis: Worthy of protection.
dictionary.fusion:
All weapons and armor ready.
Ammo reload complete.
Awaiting dispatch orders.
dictionary.summon:
One defeat crushed me entirely.
My defect is in my reboot system
activated when I lose.

leader skill.name: 護陰陽の法力

sbb.name: Code:N21 全弾発射

ubb.name: ネメシス・ウィング

bb.name: 光刃蒼断

dictionary.description: A Summoner who joined the Akras Summoners' Hall when it first began operations. Since Krantz was a soldier of humble origins from the Elgaia Federation, records of his infancy are scarce. However, once he became a Summoner under the tutelage of the Summoners of Old, his talents began to blossom rapidly in a very short amount of time, reaching extremely high levels. Bearing the burden of the next generation on his shoulders, the Summoners of Old expected many great things from him, though he had one big problem. Since he was so terrible at handling machines, there were no records he could leave behind concerning otherworldly technology and techniques.
dictionary.fusion:
I want to become stronger!
I mean, if I get stronger,
I can help more people, right?
dictionary.summon:
Thanks for summoning me!
Just you wait!
I'll become your strength!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 光陣蒼空断

dictionary.description: The former commander of the now defunct 9th Squadron of the Demon Slayers. As he was surveying the region of Lizeria, Krantz encountered some beings who were hurting humans, leading him to engage in a fierce battle against them. The reason why Lizeria became void of power and remained out of the reach of Four Fallen Gods' rule was because of what Krantz had accomplished there. However, when he went to investigate a mysterious tower in the crucial location of La Veda, he was unable to report anything about it due to his estranged relationship with technology.
dictionary.evolution:
How's that?! Not to shabby, eh? Now
with all this energy, I'll complete
all my missions in one go!
dictionary.fusion:
This feels nice! This power
is from that science stuff, right?
Sorry, I just wanted to say that...
dictionary.summon:
I'm awful with machines.
I did try studying them, but... I
learned about everything else though!

leader skill.name: 五光霊神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、攻撃に光・闇属性を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 輝燕蒼煌断

dictionary.description: A Summoner selected to join the covert "Ishgria's Recon Squad." Immediately after touching ground in Ishgria, Krantz was appointed as the acting commander of the squadron, whose members decreased to just three after suffering the attack of a terrible beast. Shortly afterwards, another powerful demon made its appearance, and thus Krantz made a choice. He would stay behind with Libera to face the demon, while the remaining member of their squadron reported the findings Unfortunately, that member would never return to Elgaia.
dictionary.evolution:
It'd be a lie to say that I have no
regrets, but I can definitely say
that I did my very best.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't overthink things anymore.
I just believe in my own judgment,
and keep aiming higher!
dictionary.summon:
I was entrusted with the future,
and now I'll entrust it to another.
I'm sure that person will...

bb.name: 飛光の槍『リーブラ』

dictionary.description: A being always mentioned with the Sacred Lance. It is said that Nadore was of neither elven, demonic, nor divine origin. Remnants of her presence have been found throughout many historical periods, and she has been linked to many historical battles as well. It is said that as the wielder of the Sacred Lance, Nadore was secretly revered as the guardian goddess of all soldiers. Because of the mystery surrounding her background, many believe that Nadore is the physical manifestation of the Sacred Lance itself, which was in need of a physical body in order to carry out its will.
dictionary.fusion:
Do not underestimate those who know
the true meaning of power.
Please continue making me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
My name is Nadore.
Will you look after me?
And the power to rule the world...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をアップ・光属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
bb.name: 閃空の槍『カエルム』

dictionary.description: A being always mentioned with the Sacred Lance. Though no official historical accounts tell of the appearance of a terribly powerful demonic beast and an evil presence that accompanied it, there is enough information scattered about to infer this indeed happened. However, absolutely no information on the damage they caused, nor on their ultimate fate remains. Those familiarized with the legends of the Sacred Treasures believe that Nadore was the one who defeated said evil, though through a historical tangent not recognized as canon.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolution has changed me.
I've reached a new level.
No more, no less.
dictionary.fusion:
Those who already have power,
always seek more power in the end.
Please continue making me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
What is a Sacred Treasure?
A meaningless question.
Just like asking what a human is.

leader skill.name: 輝秤神の天戒

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な光属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力をかなりアップ・光属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: ゲイルスケグル

bb.name: 神律の槍『パルージア』

dictionary.description: A being always mentioned with the Sacred Lance. No one was ever able to tell what type of being Nadore was, but there is no doubt that her existence influenced the course of human history. A literary work found recently during a survey of Ishgria tells of a demon legend in which she appears. According to it, whoever holds the Sacred Lance in their possession will gain the power to change the world. However, the end of such legend also states that Nadore refused to become anyone's property, setting out to change the world on her own accord.
dictionary.evolution:
You've evolved me yet again.
Along with the Sacred Lance.
Let us save the world together then.
dictionary.fusion:
Those who know the essence of power,
have not forsaken their hearts.
Please continue making me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I don't think.
The lance guides me and its bearer.
That means I'm strong enough
to control my thoughts.

sbb.name: デア・ゲイルスケグル

ubb.name: 双覇槍『イース=カノッサ』

bb.name: みんなを守る！

dictionary.description: A warrior from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. Accompanied by the sprite Pirika, Yuuri set off on a journey to recover Phoena's lost memories, eventually making a great number of friends along the way. Fighting an enemy known as the "Black Army," he always inspires his comrades by encouraging them to "grab the light." Before anyone knew it, Yuuri had become the leader of the Volunteer Army, fighting in the vanguard as its captain in order to protect his friends from the hordes of powerful enemies they constantly face.
dictionary.fusion:
Volunteer Army, let's do this!
With all of our powers combined,
we can grab the light!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Yuuri,
captain of the Volunteer Army.
For my precious friends,
I'll grab the light here too!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 絆が見せる光

bb.desc: 敵全体に光属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をかなりアップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
bb.name: 光をつかむ！

dictionary.description: A warrior from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. In order to bring the world he had envisioned into a reality, Yuuri transformed the bonds he had created with others into a bright light, using it to stop the powerful enemies that stood in his way. Believing in his friends, by the time the long battle had come to its conclusion he had led a great number of Volunteer Army warriors to become the savior of Yggdra. In the aftermath, when the continent had plunged into chaos once again, Yuuri and his comrades set off towards a new land in order to save their world. However, many trials would await the Volunteer Army as it battled its way towards fulfilling this new dream.
dictionary.evolution:
Did you see that?
Yggdra could be saved thanks to
the power of the bonds made
by the Volunteer Army.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
I'll keep fighting to make
our ideal world into a reality!
dictionary.summon:
We have a goal to achieve.
Won't you fight with us
to help us realize our dream?

leader skill.name: 義勇軍の絆

sbb.name: クロノブレード

bb.name: エンプティ・フェイト

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lucius, the Sealed God. Not only did he help the people of Grand Gaia flee to Elgaia after the invasion of the gods, but he also opened the gate to Grand Gaia once again to save the world from the threat of the Four Fallen Gods. However, since his actual motive was to restore balance to the world, Lucius would later grow hostile against the Summoners who had once helped him. Though powerful, this mock Unit is considered incomplete as it lacks its original counterpart's ability to manipulate the gates.
dictionary.fusion:
Summoner, you do not grasp
the true essence of your power...
Your power is nothing but a curse...
dictionary.summon:
I am Lucius...
The god who rules the gates...
And the keeper of all order...

extra skill.name: 秩序を守りし存在

leader skill.name: 封神の天地万有

sbb.name: メタノイア

ubb.name: ゲート

dictionary.description: A white divine beast native to Ishgria. Having inherited an ancient tablet from its ancestors, it keeps it under close guard to prevent it from being stolen by its natural enemy, the Emgif. It is said that this tablet contains many secret techniques sealed within it, and that whomsoever is fused with it gains the same mysterious abilities. Very rarely spotted in nature, many consider the Elgif to be a good omen when they make an appearance. However, they do disappear when they gift others with the techniques in their tablet.
dictionary.summon:
My tablet...
Please give its powers...
...to someone worthy...

50792.name: 天賦の石版守エルギフ

leader skill.name: 天界の恵み

bb.name: スピリットアビス

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 天界の恵み
